dishes.name: Single Pod
dishes.description: Single Pod offers a soft wheatflour roll filled with paneer and egg, a unique and flavorful combination.

dishes.name: Combo Pod
dishes.description: Combo Pod offers a single roll and a ricebowl with multiple filling options, including Paneer and chicken.

dishes.name: Afgani Pizza
dishes.description: Afgani Pizza is a popular street food dish originating from Afghanistan. It features a thin, crispy flatbread topped with a savory mixture of ground beef or mutton, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, and cardamom. The pizza is baked until the toppings are cooked through and the edges are crispy. It is typically enjoyed as a quick, flavorful meal, often accompanied by a side of fresh salad or yogurt.

dishes.name: CHICKEN WINGS
dishes.description: Chicken wings are a popular snack or appetizer, featuring crispy, deep-fried or baked chicken wings coated in a variety of sauces, such as buffalo, BBQ, or teriyaki. Originating from American cuisine, they are known for their savory, spicy, or tangy flavors, depending on the seasoning. These wings are typically enjoyed as a bar snack, game-day food, or casual appetizer, often accompanied by celery sticks and ranch or blue cheese dressing.

dishes.name: Spicy chicken
dishes.description: Spicy chicken is a flavorful main course dish featuring tender chicken pieces coated in a fiery marinade or sauce. The core ingredients typically include chicken, chili peppers, garlic, ginger, and aromatic spices. It is often grilled, fried, or baked to achieve a crispy exterior while retaining juicy meat. Originating from various cuisines, this dish is known for its bold, spicy, and savory flavor profile. It is commonly enjoyed as a main course or accompaniment in both casual and festive settings.

dishes.name: Nuggets
dishes.description: Nuggets are bite-sized pieces of meat, typically chicken, that are breaded and deep-fried until crispy. They are a popular snack or appetizer, often served with dipping sauces like ketchup, barbecue, or honey mustard. Originating from the United States, nuggets are enjoyed worldwide for their savory, crunchy exterior and tender interior. They are commonly found in fast-food chains and home-cooked meals, making them a versatile and kid-friendly favorite.

dishes.name: Fruit Salad
dishes.description: A refreshing and healthy dish, fruit salad is a vibrant mix of seasonal fruits, often including apples, oranges, bananas, and berries. Typically served chilled, it may be dressed with a light drizzle of honey, a squeeze of lemon juice, or a sprinkle of mint for added freshness. Enjoyed as a dessert, snack, or breakfast option, this dish is popular worldwide and can be customized to suit various tastes and dietary preferences.

dishes.name: French Fries
dishes.description: French fries are a beloved snack or side dish made from deep-fried potatoes. They are typically cut into thin strips, fried until golden and crispy, and seasoned with salt. Originating from Belgium, they are now enjoyed worldwide as a popular accompaniment to burgers, sandwiches, or as a standalone snack. Their flavor profile is savory and satisfying, with a perfect balance of crispy exterior and soft interior.

dishes.name: Orange Juice
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Orange Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of oranges. Typically prepared by squeezing fresh oranges, it can also be made from concentrate. This tangy and sweet drink is enjoyed worldwide as a morning staple, a refreshing accompaniment, or a base for various cocktails. It is often served chilled and can be customized with added sweeteners or spices like cinnamon.

dishes.name: Cocktails
dishes.description: Cocktails are alcoholic beverages typically served in a glass and enjoyed as aperitifs or social drinks. They are crafted by mixing various spirits, such as vodka, rum, or gin, with juices, sodas, or other mixers, often garnished with fruits or herbs. Originating from diverse cultures, cocktails offer a wide range of flavors, from sweet and tangy to bitter and herbal. They are commonly served in bars, lounges, and at social gatherings, enhancing the dining and social experience.

dishes.name: Milk Shake
dishes.description: A classic beverage made by blending milk with various flavors such as fruits, chocolate, or vanilla. It is typically served chilled and can be enjoyed as a refreshing drink or a sweet treat. The consistency can range from thin to thick, depending on the preparation method.

dishes.name: Chicken burgers
dishes.description: Chicken burgers are a popular main course dish featuring a juicy chicken patty as the core ingredient, typically seasoned and cooked on a grill or skillet. Served on a soft bun, they are often accompanied by fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, crisp onions, and tangy condiments like mayonnaise or mustard. Originating from the United States, chicken burgers are enjoyed globally as a casual meal, perfect for quick lunches, dinners, or as a hearty snack. The flavor profile is savory and customizable, with options to add cheese, bacon, or various sauces for extra depth.

dishes.name: Iced Tea
dishes.description: Iced Tea is a refreshing beverage made by brewing tea leaves and then chilling the resulting liquid over ice. Core ingredients include tea leaves, water, and sweeteners like sugar or honey, often accompanied by lemon or mint for added flavor. Originating from various cultures, it is enjoyed worldwide as a cool, invigorating drink, perfect for hot days or as a casual accompaniment to meals.

dishes.name: Coffee
dishes.description: Coffee is a popular beverage made from roasted coffee beans, typically brewed with hot water. Originating from the Arabian Peninsula, it is enjoyed worldwide for its rich, aromatic flavor and stimulating effects. Served hot or cold, it can be customized with milk, sugar, or various flavorings, making it a versatile drink for any time of day.

dishes.name: Cheeseburger
dishes.description: A classic American fast-food staple, the cheeseburger features a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, served on a soft bun. Typically accompanied by lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and condiments like ketchup and mustard, it's a savory and satisfying main course. Grilled or fried to perfection, it's enjoyed as a quick meal or a casual snack, often paired with fries and a soda.

dishes.name: Lemon Tea
dishes.description: Lemon Tea is a refreshing beverage made from brewed tea infused with fresh lemon juice and sweetened to taste. Originating from various cultures, it is enjoyed hot or cold, often as a daily drink or a pick-me-up. The tangy, citrusy flavor of lemon complements the tea's natural bitterness, creating a balanced and invigorating drink. It is commonly served as a comforting beverage throughout the day.

dishes.name: Cheese sandwich
dishes.description: A simple yet delightful snack or light meal, the Cheese Sandwich is a classic dish made with bread, cheese, and often complemented with ingredients like butter, mayonnaise, or vegetables. The sandwich is typically assembled by layering sliced cheese between two pieces of bread, which can be toasted or grilled to achieve a crispy texture. Originating from Western cuisine, it is enjoyed for its savory and comforting flavors, making it a popular choice for breakfast, lunch, or a quick snack.

dishes.name: Sandwich
dishes.description: A sandwich is a versatile dish typically consisting of one or more types of food placed on or between slices of bread. It can include a variety of fillings such as meats, cheeses, vegetables, and condiments, and is often prepared by assembling and pressing the ingredients together. Originating from Europe, sandwiches are enjoyed worldwide as a convenient snack or light meal, offering a balance of flavors and textures.

dishes.name: Hot dog
dishes.description: A classic American street food, the hot dog features a grilled or steamed sausage, typically a frankfurter or Vienna sausage, nestled in a soft bun. It's often topped with condiments like mustard, ketchup, relish, onions, and sometimes sauerkraut or cheese. The hot dog is a staple at ballparks, fairs, and casual gatherings, offering a savory, satisfying bite that's quick and easy to enjoy.

dishes.name: Butter Naan
dishes.description: Butter Naan is a soft, leavened flatbread that originates from the Indian subcontinent. Made from wheat flour, yeast, yogurt, and butter, it is baked in a tandoor or skillet until golden and brushed with melted butter. This bread has a slightly tangy flavor, a fluffy texture, and a crispy exterior, making it a perfect accompaniment to curries and dals. It is commonly enjoyed as part of a daily meal or at festive gatherings.

dishes.name: Mushroom Curry
dishes.description: Mushroom Curry is a flavorful vegetarian main course featuring mushrooms as the primary ingredient, often combined with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, and turmeric. The mushrooms are typically saut√©ed and simmered in a rich, spiced tomato-based gravy, creating a savory and slightly tangy dish. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, this curry is enjoyed with steamed rice or Indian flatbreads like naan or roti, making it a hearty and satisfying meal.

dishes.name: Matar Mushroom
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Matar Mushroom is a hearty vegetarian main course featuring green peas and mushrooms as its core ingredients. The dish is typically prepared by saut√©ing the ingredients with a blend of aromatic spices, onions, tomatoes, and a touch of cream or yogurt for richness. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, it offers a savory and slightly spicy flavor profile. This dish is commonly enjoyed as a part of a daily meal, often paired with rice or Indian breads like roti or naan.

dishes.name: Egg Biryani
dishes.description: Egg Biryani is a fragrant and flavorful one-pot dish featuring hard-boiled eggs layered with spiced basmati rice, caramelized onions, and a blend of aromatic spices like cardamom, cinnamon, and saffron. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, this dish is typically prepared by slow-cooking the ingredients together, allowing the flavors to meld beautifully. It is a popular main course, often enjoyed during festive occasions or as a hearty meal, and is best served with raita or a side of mirchi ka salan.

dishes.name: Veg. Fried Rice
dishes.description: Veg. Fried Rice is a versatile and flavorful main course dish featuring steamed rice stir-fried with an assortment of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, carrots, peas, and beans. Often seasoned with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger, it offers a savory and aromatic profile. This dish is enjoyed worldwide, with roots in Chinese cuisine, and is commonly served as a quick, nutritious meal or a side dish.

dishes.name: Chicken Chowmein
dishes.description: Chicken Chowmein is a popular Indo-Chinese stir-fried noodle dish. It features tender chicken pieces, crisp vegetables like bell peppers and cabbage, and flavorful noodles tossed in a savory soy-based sauce. The dish is typically pan-fried and seasoned with garlic, ginger, and chili, offering a delightful blend of spicy and umami flavors. Enjoyed as a main course, it's a staple in Indian-Chinese cuisine and often served in restaurants and street food stalls.

dishes.name: Kashmiri Pulao
dishes.description: Kashmiri Pulao is a fragrant and mildly spiced rice dish from the Kashmir region of India. It features basmati rice cooked with a blend of aromatic spices, nuts, dried fruits, and tender pieces of meat, typically chicken or lamb. The dish is slow-cooked to perfection, allowing the flavors to meld together, resulting in a savory and subtly sweet profile. Often served as a main course during festive occasions and special gatherings, Kashmiri Pulao is a hearty and comforting dish that showcases the rich culinary heritage of Kashmir.

dishes.name: Lachha Paratha
dishes.description: Lachha Paratha is a flaky, layered Indian flatbread made from whole wheat flour, ghee, and water. The dough is rolled, layered with ghee, and cooked on a griddle until golden brown, resulting in crispy, buttery layers. Originating from the Punjab region, it is a popular breakfast or snack item, often served with yogurt, pickles, or curry. The dish offers a savory, slightly sweet flavor with a satisfying texture.

dishes.name: Butter Paneer
dishes.description: Butter Paneer is a rich and creamy North Indian curry featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) as the main ingredient. The dish is prepared by cooking paneer in a velvety tomato-based gravy, infused with aromatic spices like garam masala, kasuri methi, and a touch of cream. It is a popular vegetarian main course, often enjoyed with naan, roti, or steamed rice, offering a savory and mildly spicy flavor profile.

dishes.name: Veg. Kofta

dishes.description: Gobhi Paratha is a savory Indian flatbread stuffed with spiced cauliflower, onions, and green chilies. This hearty main course is a staple in North Indian cuisine, often enjoyed for breakfast or dinner. The dough is rolled out, filled with the flavorful cauliflower mixture, and then pan-fried to golden perfection. It is typically served with yogurt, pickle, or a side of fresh vegetables.

dishes.name: Shahi Paneer
dishes.description: Shahi Paneer is a rich and creamy Indian dish featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a luxurious gravy made with tomatoes, onions, cashews, and cream. The paneer is lightly fried and then simmered in a spiced tomato-cashew sauce, infused with aromatic spices like cardamom, garam masala, and saffron. Originating from the Mughal era, this dish is a staple in North Indian cuisine and is often served with naan or rice. Its flavor profile is a delightful blend of creamy, spicy, and slightly sweet notes, making it a favorite for both everyday meals and special occasions.

dishes.name: Paneer Pasanda
dishes.description: Paneer Pasanda is a rich and flavorful Indian main course dish featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) marinated in a spiced yogurt mixture, layered with a creamy cashew-nut paste, and baked to perfection. Originating from the Mughlai cuisine of North India, it offers a blend of savory and mildly spicy flavors. This dish is typically enjoyed as a hearty meal, often paired with naan or steamed rice, making it a popular choice for both festive occasions and everyday dining.

dishes.name: Veg. Manchurian
dishes.description: Veg. Manchurian is a popular Indo-Chinese snack or appetizer featuring crispy fried vegetable balls coated in a tangy, spicy, and slightly sweet sauce. The core ingredients include cabbage, carrots, bell peppers, and a blend of soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and chili. These are deep-fried to achieve a crunchy texture and then tossed in the flavorful sauce. It is typically served as a street food or starter, often accompanied by fried rice or noodles.

dishes.name: Paneer Korma
dishes.description: Paneer Korma is a rich, creamy North Indian main course dish featuring cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a velvety gravy. The gravy is made with a blend of onions, tomatoes, cashews, and spices like garam masala, giving it a mild, aromatic, and slightly sweet flavor. This dish is typically enjoyed with naan or steamed basmati rice, making it a comforting choice for daily meals or special occasions.

dishes.name: Kadai Paneer
dishes.description: Kadai Paneer is a popular North Indian main course dish featuring cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a spicy, tangy gravy. The core ingredients include paneer, bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices like garam masala, coriander, and cumin. Prepared in a kadai (a deep, circular, and heavy-based pan), the dish is saut√©ed to perfection, offering a rich and smoky flavor profile. It is typically enjoyed with naan, roti, or steamed rice, making it a staple in both daily meals and festive gatherings.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken
dishes.description: Butter Chicken, a beloved Indian dish, features tender chicken pieces in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy. Core ingredients include chicken, butter, tomatoes, cream, and aromatic spices like garam masala. The chicken is marinated in yogurt and spices, then grilled or cooked before being simmered in the velvety sauce. Originating from Punjab, this dish is known for its mildly spicy, savory, and slightly sweet flavor profile. It's typically served with naan or basmati rice, making it a popular main course in both everyday meals and special occasions.

dishes.name: Onion Chilly Raita
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Onion Chilly Raita is a refreshing yogurt-based side dish featuring finely chopped onions, green chilies, and a blend of spices. The yogurt is seasoned with roasted cumin powder, black salt, and a touch of chaat masala, creating a tangy and slightly spicy flavor profile. This dish is commonly served as an accompaniment to spicy Indian meals, providing a cooling contrast to the heat of curries and biryanis. It's a popular choice for both daily meals and festive occasions.

dishes.name: Tandoori Chicken Full
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Tandoori Chicken Full is a vibrant and aromatic main course dish featuring succulent chicken marinated in a blend of yogurt, lemon juice, and a medley of spices, including turmeric, cumin, coriander, and garam masala. The chicken is traditionally cooked in a tandoor, a cylindrical clay oven, giving it a distinctive smoky flavor and charred exterior. Originating from the Punjab region of India, this dish is known for its tangy, spicy, and savory flavor profile. It is often served with naan bread, rice, or a side of cooling raita, making it a popular choice for both daily meals and festive occasions.

dishes.name: Palak Paneer
dishes.description: Palak Paneer is a beloved North Indian vegetarian main course featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a creamy, spiced spinach gravy. The dish is prepared by blending spinach with aromatic spices, onions, and tomatoes, then simmered with cubed paneer. It offers a rich, savory, and slightly tangy flavor profile, often enjoyed with naan or rice as a comforting daily meal or festive dish.

dishes.name: Paneer Lababdaar
dishes.description: Paneer Lababdaar is a rich and creamy North Indian curry featuring cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a velvety tomato-based gravy. The dish is prepared by simmering paneer in a spiced tomato and cream sauce, often enhanced with cashew paste for added richness. It is typically enjoyed as a main course, paired with naan or steamed rice, offering a delightful blend of savory and slightly tangy flavors.

dishes.name: Dal Jeera Fry
dishes.description: Dal Jeera Fry is a flavorful Indian lentil dish featuring yellow lentils tempered with cumin seeds, garlic, and a blend of aromatic spices. The lentils are cooked until soft and then fried with these ingredients to create a savory and slightly spicy dish. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, it is commonly enjoyed as a comforting main course or accompaniment to rice and bread. The dish is known for its rich, earthy flavors and is a staple in both everyday meals and festive occasions.

dishes.name: Dal Handi
dishes.description: Dal Handi is a traditional Indian dish, primarily a main course, that combines lentils (dal) cooked in a clay pot (handi) with a blend of spices. The lentils are slow-cooked with ingredients like turmeric, cumin, and coriander, creating a savory and aromatic flavor profile. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, this dish is often enjoyed with rice or flatbreads, making it a hearty and comforting meal. It is a staple in many Indian households and is also served during festive occasions.

dishes.name: Kashmiri Mix Veg.
dishes.description: Kashmiri Mix Veg is a vibrant and aromatic vegetable dish that showcases the rich culinary traditions of Kashmir. This main course features a medley of seasonal vegetables such as spinach, beans, and turnips, cooked with aromatic spices like fennel, asafoetida, and Kashmiri red chili powder. The vegetables are gently simmered to retain their natural flavors, creating a dish that is both savory and subtly sweet. Typically served with steamed rice or traditional Kashmiri bread, it is a staple in daily meals and festive gatherings, offering a comforting and wholesome dining experience.

dishes.name: Mutton Curry
dishes.description: Mutton Curry is a hearty and flavorful main course dish featuring tender pieces of mutton cooked in a rich, aromatic gravy. The core ingredients include mutton, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, and a blend of spices such as turmeric, cumin, coriander, and chili powder. This dish is typically prepared by slow-cooking the mutton in the spiced gravy until it becomes tender and infused with the flavors. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, Mutton Curry is known for its savory and spicy flavor profile. It is often enjoyed with steamed rice or Indian breads like naan or roti, making it a staple in both daily meals and festive gatherings.

dishes.name: Egg Fried Rice
dishes.description: Egg Fried Rice is a popular main course dish featuring steamed rice stir-fried with scrambled eggs, vegetables, and often soy sauce. Originating from Chinese cuisine, it is savory and umami-rich, with a slightly smoky flavor from the wok. This versatile dish is enjoyed as a quick meal, street food, or a comforting daily staple.

dishes.name: Prosciutto & Egg Breakfast Wrap
dishes.description: Indulge in the perfect breakfast with our Prosciutto & Egg Breakfast Wrap, featuring scrambled eggs, crispy prosciutto, peppery arugula, and nutty asiago cheese all wrapped up in a grilled tortilla.

dishes.name: Breakfast Pizza Slice
dishes.description: Indulge in our breakfast twist on a classic pizza, featuring a thin crust topped with egg, pancetta, and fontina cheese for a savory and satisfying start to your day.

dishes.name: Espresso
dishes.description: Experience the rich flavor of our classic espresso, available in single or double shots.

dishes.name: Brioche con Marmellata
dishes.description: Soft, freshly baked brioche buns filled with sweet and tangy seasonal jam, perfect for a delicious breakfast or snack.

dishes.name: Sfogliatella
dishes.description: Indulge in the crispy shell pastry of Sfogliatella, filled with sweet ricotta and a hint of orange zest for a delightful treat.

dishes.name: Frittata Panino
dishes.description: Experience the authentic taste of Italy with Frittata Panino, serving up a delicious Italian-style omelet filled with fresh spinach, cherry tomatoes, and melted provolone cheese, all wrapped in a crispy ciabatta roll.

dishes.name: Cappuccino
dishes.description: Rich and creamy cappuccino made with expertly pulled espresso and steamed foam.

dishes.name: Cioccolata Calda
dishes.description: Thick Italian-style hot chocolate

dishes.name: Italian Breakfast Board
dishes.description: Explore the taste of Italy with our Italian Breakfast Board, featuring a selection of artisanal cheeses, cured meats, olives, and crusty focaccia.

dishes.name: Caff√® Latte
dishes.description: Rich and smooth espresso blended with steamed milk, a classic coffeehouse treat.

dishes.name: Cornetto alla Crema
dishes.description: Flaky Italian croissant filled with creamy vanilla goodness, perfect for a sweet treat.

dishes.name: DONUT
dishes.description: A donut is a popular sweet treat, typically classified as a dessert or snack. It is made from a dough of flour, sugar, eggs, and yeast or baking powder, which is deep-fried and then coated with sugar or glazed. Originating in the Netherlands, donuts are enjoyed worldwide, often as a breakfast item or indulgent snack. Their flavor profile is sweet and rich, with variations including chocolate, jelly-filled, and cinnamon sugar.

dishes.name: 4 CHEESES
dishes.description: 4 Cheeses is a rich and indulgent pizza variety, featuring a blend of four distinct cheeses: mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and provolone. The pizza is typically topped with these cheeses, which melt together to create a creamy and flavorful layer. Originating from Italian-American cuisine, this pizza is baked to perfection, offering a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile. It is enjoyed as a main course, often accompanied by a side of garlic bread or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: MARGARITA
dishes.description: A classic cocktail, the Margarita combines tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, typically served over ice in a salt-rimmed glass. This beverage is a staple of Mexican cuisine, known for its tangy, slightly sweet, and refreshing flavor. It's often enjoyed as an aperitif or a celebratory drink, perfect for social gatherings and festive occasions.

dishes.name: BOTTLED WATER
dishes.description: Bottled water is a beverage consisting of water packaged in plastic or glass containers. It is typically sourced from springs, wells, or municipal supplies and undergoes filtration and purification processes. Enjoyed globally for hydration, it is a common accompaniment to meals or consumed throughout the day.

dishes.name: SPICY BEAN BURGER
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A Spicy Bean Burger is a flavorful vegetarian patty made primarily from mashed beans, spices, and breadcrumbs, often mixed with onions, garlic, and chili peppers. The patty is typically pan-fried or baked until crispy and served in a bun with fresh vegetables, sauces, and condiments. This dish is popular as a quick, protein-rich meal or snack, offering a savory and spicy flavor profile that appeals to a wide range of palates.

dishes.name: BIG BEN BURGER
dishes.description: The Big Ben Burger is a hearty main course featuring a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, ripe tomato slices, and a tangy BBQ sauce. Grilled to perfection and served on a toasted brioche bun, this burger is a flavorful delight. Originating from American cuisine, it's a popular choice for casual dining and fast-food menus, offering a savory and satisfying meal experience.

dishes.name: DOUBLE CHEESE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Double Cheese is a rich and indulgent snack or side dish featuring a generous layering of melted cheese. Typically made with a combination of mozzarella and cheddar, it is often baked or grilled to achieve a gooey, golden-brown finish. This dish is popular in various cuisines, particularly as a topping for burgers, pizzas, or as a standalone cheesy delight. It offers a savory, creamy flavor profile that is both comforting and satisfying, making it a favorite for cheese lovers.

dishes.name: VEGGIE BURGER
dishes.description: A plant-based twist on the classic burger, the Veggie Burger features a patty made from a blend of vegetables, grains, and legumes, often seasoned with herbs and spices. The patty is typically grilled or pan-fried and served in a bun, accompanied by fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and a variety of condiments like ketchup, mustard, or mayo. Originating as a vegetarian and vegan alternative, this dish is enjoyed as a main course in casual dining settings, offering a savory and hearty flavor profile. It's a popular choice for those seeking a meat-free option that's both nutritious and delicious.

dishes.name: WAFFLE & ICE CREAM
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A classic dessert, Waffle & Ice Cream features crisp, golden waffles topped with a scoop of creamy ice cream. The waffles are typically made from a batter of flour, eggs, and milk, cooked on a special iron to create a grid pattern. This sweet treat is often enjoyed as a dessert or snack, with optional toppings like syrup, fruits, or whipped cream.

dishes.name: TUNA & ONION
dishes.description: Tuna & Onion is a simple yet flavorful dish typically served as a main course or a hearty snack. The core ingredients include fresh tuna, onions, and a blend of spices, often cooked together in a pan. This dish is popular in various cuisines, particularly in Mediterranean and Latin American regions, where it is enjoyed for its savory and slightly tangy flavors. The tuna is usually seared or grilled, then combined with caramelized onions and herbs, creating a delightful balance of textures and tastes. It can be served as a standalone dish or accompanied by rice, bread, or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: ICE CREAM CORNET
dishes.description: A delightful frozen dessert, Ice Cream Cornet features creamy ice cream scoops served in a crisp, cone-shaped pastry. The core ingredients include milk, sugar, and flavorings for the ice cream, and flour, butter, and sugar for the cornet. This treat is enjoyed worldwide as a popular dessert, often served at ice cream parlors, cafes, and street vendors. Its flavor profile is sweet and creamy, with a satisfying crunch from the cornet. It's a perfect indulgence for any occasion, from a casual snack to a festive treat.

dishes.name: APPLE PIE

dishes.description: Mixed spring greens topped with kalamata olives, cucumber, pickled red onions, and feta, with Greek dressing

dishes.name: Paneer & Jalapeno Pinwheel
dishes.description: Indulge in the perfect blend of creamy paneer and spicy jalapeno in our signature Paneer & Jalapeno Pinwheel, a delightful fusion of Indian and Mexican flavors.

dishes.name: Cauliflower Manchurian
dishes.description: Cauliflower Manchurian is a popular Indo-Chinese snack or appetizer featuring deep-fried cauliflower florets coated in a savory, spicy, and tangy sauce made from soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and chili. The dish is known for its bold flavors and crispy texture, often garnished with green onions and served with steamed rice or fried noodles. It's a favorite in Indian-Chinese cuisine, enjoyed as a street food or a starter in restaurants.

dishes.name: Crunch Max Chicken Strips
dishes.description: Crunch Max Chicken Strips are a popular snack or appetizer featuring tender chicken strips coated in a crispy, seasoned batter. These strips are typically deep-fried to achieve a golden, crunchy exterior while keeping the inside juicy. Originating from fast-food chains, they are known for their savory and slightly spicy flavor profile. Often served with dipping sauces like BBQ or honey mustard, they are a favorite for casual meals and gatherings.

dishes.name: Pachimirchi Royyalu
dishes.description: Pachimirchi Royyalu is a traditional Andhra snack known for its crispy texture and spicy flavor. Made primarily from green chilies stuffed with a mixture of roasted gram flour, spices, and herbs, it is deep-fried to achieve a golden-brown finish. This savory and tangy treat is often enjoyed as a tea-time snack or a quick bite on the go, offering a delightful crunch with every bite.

dishes.name: Romesco Dip
dishes.description: Romesco Dip is a rich, smoky, and slightly sweet Spanish dip made primarily from roasted red peppers, almonds, garlic, olive oil, and smoked paprika. Traditionally prepared by blending these ingredients into a smooth paste, it originates from the Catalonia region of Spain. This versatile dip is often enjoyed with bread, grilled vegetables, or as a sauce for grilled meats, offering a savory and nutty flavor profile.

dishes.name: Mint Chutney
dishes.description: Mint Chutney is a vibrant, tangy condiment that pairs perfectly with various Indian snacks and dishes. Made primarily from fresh mint leaves, green chilies, garlic, and a blend of spices, it is finely ground into a smooth or chunky paste. This versatile chutney originates from the Indian subcontinent and is enjoyed for its refreshing and cooling properties, balancing the heat of spicy foods. It is commonly served as an accompaniment to samosas, pakoras, and chaats, enhancing their flavors with its zesty and aromatic profile.

dishes.name: Cocktail Sauce
dishes.description: Cocktail Sauce is a tangy, spicy condiment typically served as an accompaniment to seafood dishes. Its core ingredients include ketchup, horseradish, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and hot sauce, creating a vibrant and zesty flavor profile. This versatile sauce is often used to enhance the taste of shrimp, crab, or other seafood appetizers, adding a kick of heat and acidity. Originating from American cuisine, it's a staple in seafood restaurants and a popular choice for enhancing the dining experience.

dishes.name: Sweet Chili Sauce
dishes.description: Sweet Chili Sauce is a versatile condiment known for its balanced blend of sweet and spicy flavors. Made primarily from red chili peppers, garlic, vinegar, sugar, and salt, it offers a vibrant, tangy, and slightly sweet taste. Originating from Southeast Asia, this sauce is commonly used as a dipping sauce for spring rolls, satay, or as a marinade for grilled meats. Its glossy texture and rich flavor make it a popular accompaniment in both street food and home-cooked meals.

dishes.name: Hot Garlic Sauce
dishes.description: Hot Garlic Sauce is a spicy, savory condiment that serves as a versatile accompaniment to various dishes. Made primarily from minced garlic, chili peppers, soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar, it offers a bold, garlicky flavor with a fiery kick. Originating from Chinese cuisine, this sauce is typically used as a dipping sauce for dumplings, noodles, or as a flavor enhancer for stir-fries. Its tangy and spicy profile makes it a favorite for those who enjoy intense, aromatic flavors.

dishes.name: Classic Vegetable Fried Rice
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Classic Vegetable Fried Rice is a versatile main course dish featuring a medley of vibrant vegetables like bell peppers, carrots, and peas, stir-fried with fluffy rice and aromatic seasonings. This dish, originating from Chinese cuisine, is prepared by quickly frying the ingredients in a wok or skillet to preserve their crisp texture and fresh flavors. With a savory and slightly umami taste, it's often enjoyed as a daily meal or a comforting side dish, garnished with green onions and served hot.

dishes.name: Vegetable Soft Noodles
dishes.description: Vegetable Soft Noodles are a comforting main course featuring tender wheat noodles as the core ingredient, complemented by a vibrant mix of fresh vegetables such as bell peppers, carrots, and cabbage. The noodles are boiled until soft and then tossed with the vegetables in a light, savory sauce, often seasoned with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger. Originating from Chinese cuisine, this dish is enjoyed for its mild, savory flavor profile and is commonly served as a quick, nutritious meal or as a side dish.

dishes.name: Thai Yellow Curry Veg
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Thai Yellow Curry Veg is a fragrant and creamy vegetarian dish featuring a vibrant yellow curry sauce made with coconut milk, turmeric, and a blend of aromatic spices. The curry is loaded with an assortment of fresh vegetables such as bell peppers, carrots, bamboo shoots, and bamboo. It is typically enjoyed with steamed jasmine rice, making it a comforting and flavorful main course in Thai cuisine.

dishes.name: Stir Fried Vegetables
dishes.description: Stir Fried Vegetables is a versatile and nutritious dish featuring a vibrant mix of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, carrots, broccoli, and snap peas. Quickly cooked in a hot wok or pan with a savory sauce, often seasoned with garlic, ginger, and soy sauce, this dish retains the natural crunch and bright flavors of the vegetables. Originating from various Asian cuisines, it is enjoyed as a healthy side dish or a light main course, often accompanied by rice or noodles.

dishes.name: Kadai Paneer
dishes.description: Kadai Paneer is a popular North Indian vegetarian dish featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a spiced tomato and onion gravy. The dish is prepared in a kadai (a deep, thick-based wok) and is known for its smoky flavors, achieved by cooking over high heat. It is typically garnished with fresh coriander and served with naan or rice, making it a hearty and flavorful main course.

dishes.name: Veg Kofta Curry
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Veg Kofta Curry is a flavorful Indian main course featuring soft, spiced vegetable dumplings (koftas) simmered in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy. The koftas are typically made from a mix of potatoes, paneer, and aromatic spices, while the curry is enriched with cashews, onions, and a blend of spices like cumin, coriander, and garam masala. This dish is often enjoyed with naan or steamed rice, making it a hearty and satisfying meal.

dishes.name: Veg Dum Biryani
dishes.description: Veg Dum Biryani is a fragrant and flavorful vegetarian main course dish originating from the Indian subcontinent. It features layers of basmati rice, mixed vegetables, and aromatic spices, slow-cooked in a sealed pot to allow the flavors to meld together. The dish is known for its rich, savory, and slightly spicy taste, often enjoyed during festive occasions and family gatherings. It is typically served with raita or a side of salad to balance its robust flavors.

dishes.name: Pasta Cheese Casserole
dishes.description: Pasta Cheese Casserole is a hearty main course dish featuring pasta, cheese, and a creamy sauce. The pasta is typically layered with a rich cheese mixture, often including cheddar or mozzarella, and baked until golden and bubbly. This comforting dish is popular in various cuisines, particularly in American and Italian-inspired comfort food. It offers a savory and indulgent flavor profile, perfect for a family dinner or a satisfying meal.

dishes.name: Dondakaya Ullikaram
dishes.description: Dondakaya Ullikaram is a tangy and flavorful South Indian dish made primarily with ivy gourd (dondakaya) and shallots (ullikaram). The ivy gourd is cooked with shallots, green chilies, and a blend of spices, creating a savory and slightly spicy dish. This vegetarian delicacy is a staple in Andhra cuisine and is typically enjoyed as a side dish with steamed rice or roti. The combination of ivy gourd and shallots gives it a unique taste, making it a popular choice for everyday meals.

dishes.name: Sambar
dishes.description: Sambar is a lentil-based vegetable stew, a staple in South Indian cuisine. It combines toor dal (pigeon peas), tamarind, and a blend of spices like turmeric, cumin, and mustard seeds. The dish is typically tempered with curry leaves and asafoetida, offering a tangy, savory, and slightly spicy flavor profile. Sambar is enjoyed as an accompaniment to rice, idli, or dosa, making it a daily meal essential in South Indian households.

dishes.name: Bhindi Peanut Fry
dishes.description: Bhindi Peanut Fry is a vibrant and flavorful Indian dish featuring okra (bhindi) stir-fried with roasted peanuts, creating a delightful crunch. The main ingredients include fresh okra, peanuts, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices such as turmeric, cumin, and coriander. This dish is typically saut√©ed in oil, allowing the okra to absorb the spices and the peanuts to add a nutty flavor. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, it is enjoyed as a main course or a side dish, offering a savory and slightly spicy taste that pairs well with roti or rice.

dishes.name: Jeera Aloo
dishes.description: Jeera Aloo is a flavorful Indian dry curry featuring potatoes and cumin seeds as its core ingredients. The potatoes are cooked with cumin seeds, turmeric, and other spices, creating a savory and aromatic dish. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, it is typically enjoyed as a main course or side dish with roti, paratha, or rice. The dish is known for its warm, earthy flavors and is a staple in both everyday meals and festive gatherings.

dishes.name: Mango Fish Currry
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Mango Fish Curry is a flavorful main course dish that combines the sweetness of ripe mangoes with the savory taste of fish. The core ingredients include fish (often firm white fish like cod or tilapia), ripe mangoes, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices such as turmeric, cumin, and coriander. The fish is typically marinated in a spiced yogurt mixture and then cooked in a tangy mango-based gravy, resulting in a dish that is both spicy and slightly sweet. Originating from coastal regions of India, this dish is enjoyed as a hearty meal, often served with steamed rice or flatbreads.

dishes.name: Kodi Iguru
dishes.description: Kodi Iguru is a flavorful South Indian dish featuring tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich, spicy coconut-based gravy. The main ingredients include chicken, coconut, tamarind, and a blend of aromatic spices. This dish is typically prepared by simmering the chicken in a tangy and spicy coconut sauce, resulting in a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile. It is often enjoyed as a main course with steamed rice or dosa, making it a popular choice in South Indian cuisine.

dishes.name: Kung Pao Chicken Wet
dishes.description: Kung Pao Chicken Wet is a popular Chinese main course featuring tender chicken pieces stir-fried with peanuts, dried chilies, and vegetables like bell peppers and onions. The dish is seasoned with a savory and slightly spicy sauce made from soy sauce, vinegar, and Sichuan peppercorns, giving it a tangy and numbing flavor profile. Originating from Sichuan province, it is typically enjoyed as a daily meal or a festive dish, often served with steamed rice to balance its bold flavors.

dishes.name: Chicken Do Pyaza
dishes.description: Chicken Do Pyaza is a flavorful North Indian main course dish featuring tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich, spiced onion gravy. The core ingredients include chicken, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices like cumin, coriander, and garam masala. The chicken is marinated, saut√©ed, and simmered in a double portion of onions, giving it a sweet and savory depth. This dish is typically enjoyed with naan or rice, making it a popular choice for daily meals and festive occasions.

dishes.name: Royyala Iguru
dishes.description: Royyala Iguru is a traditional Andhra dish known for its rich, creamy texture and vibrant flavors. The core ingredients include fresh prawns, coconut milk, and a blend of spices like mustard seeds, curry leaves, and green chilies. The prawns are cooked in a spicy coconut gravy, creating a harmonious balance of heat and creaminess. This dish is typically enjoyed as a main course, often paired with steamed rice or idlis, and is a staple in coastal Andhra cuisine.

dishes.name: Baked Moroccan Fish
dishes.description: Baked Moroccan Fish is a flavorful main course featuring fresh fish baked with a vibrant blend of Moroccan spices such as cumin, coriander, paprika, and saffron. The fish is typically marinated in a mixture of olive oil, garlic, and lemon, then baked until tender and infused with aromatic flavors. This dish is a staple in Moroccan cuisine, known for its savory and slightly spicy profile. It is often served with couscous, rice, or fresh vegetables, making it a hearty and satisfying meal.

dishes.name: Chicken Fry Piece Biryani
dishes.description: Chicken Fry Piece Biryani is a flavorful and aromatic main course dish featuring succulent chicken pieces fried to perfection and layered with fragrant basmati rice. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, this dish is prepared with a blend of spices, herbs, and saffron, giving it a rich and savory flavor profile. It is typically enjoyed as a festive or celebratory meal, often served with raita or salad to balance its robust taste.

dishes.name: Mutton Dum Biryani
dishes.description: Mutton Dum Biryani is a fragrant and flavorful main course dish featuring tender mutton cooked with basmati rice, aromatic spices, and herbs. The dish is prepared using the 'dum' cooking method, where the ingredients are layered and slow-cooked to perfection. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, it is a celebratory dish often enjoyed during festivals and special occasions. The flavor profile is rich, spicy, and savory, with a hint of tanginess from ingredients like yogurt and saffron.

dishes.name: Tandoori roti
dishes.description: Tandoori Roti is a type of Indian flatbread, baked in a cylindrical clay oven called a tandoor. Made from whole wheat flour, water, salt, and a touch of oil, it has a slightly charred exterior and a soft, chewy interior. Originating from the Punjab region, it's a staple in North Indian cuisine and pairs perfectly with curries, dal, or kebabs. Its smoky flavor and crisp texture make it a beloved accompaniment to many meals.

dishes.name: Butter Naan
dishes.description: Butter Naan is a beloved Indian flatbread, a staple in many South Asian cuisines. Made from refined flour, yeast, yogurt, and butter, it is baked in a tandoor or cooked on a griddle until puffed and golden. Its rich, buttery flavor and soft, chewy texture make it a perfect accompaniment to curries and other dishes. Often brushed with melted butter for extra indulgence, it is enjoyed as a daily meal or at festive gatherings.

dishes.name: Garlic Naan
dishes.description: Garlic Naan is a fragrant and soft Indian flatbread, a staple in North Indian and Pakistani cuisine. Made from wheat flour, yeast, and garlic, it is brushed with melted butter and minced garlic before baking. The bread is traditionally cooked in a tandoor, giving it a slightly charred exterior and a pillowy interior. It is often served as an accompaniment to curries, kebabs, and other main dishes, enhancing meals with its savory and aromatic flavor.

dishes.name: Laccha Paratha
dishes.description: Laccha Paratha is a flaky, layered Indian flatbread originating from the Punjab region. Made from wheat dough, it is rolled, layered with ghee, and cooked on a griddle until golden and crispy. This savory and buttery bread is often enjoyed for breakfast or as a daily meal, typically paired with yogurt, pickles, or curries.

dishes.name: Pizza
dishes.description: Indulge in the richness of our cheesy pizza, crafted with love and a perfect blend of melted cheese and savory flavors, perfect for satisfying your cravings.

dishes.name: EGG BURGER
dishes.description: An Egg Burger is a popular snack or light meal featuring a fried or scrambled egg as the main protein, nestled within a soft bun. The core ingredients include eggs, buns, and often accompaniments like lettuce, tomatoes, and condiments such as mayonnaise or mustard. Originating from various cultures, it is typically enjoyed as a quick, savory bite, either as street food or a casual meal. The flavor profile is savory and can be customized with additional spices or vegetables.

dishes.name: CHEESE BURGER
dishes.description: A classic American fast-food staple, the Cheese Burger features a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and onions, all nestled within a soft bun. The patty is typically grilled or fried to perfection, adding a savory and slightly smoky flavor profile. Enjoyed as a quick lunch, dinner, or snack, this versatile dish is a favorite for its rich, indulgent taste and satisfying texture.

dishes.name: BIG BEN BURGER
dishes.description: The Big Ben Burger is a hearty main course featuring a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, ripe tomato slices, and a tangy BBQ sauce, all nestled within a toasted sesame seed bun. This indulgent burger is typically grilled to perfection, offering a savory and slightly smoky flavor profile. Originating from American fast-food culture, it is often enjoyed as a satisfying meal or snack, perfect for a quick lunch or a casual dinner.

dishes.name: DOUBLE CHEESE
dishes.description: Double Cheese is a rich and indulgent dish, typically a main course or a hearty snack. It features a generous layering of two types of cheese, often melted and combined with other ingredients like vegetables, meats, or sauces. Commonly prepared by grilling, baking, or frying, this dish is popular in various cuisines, particularly in Western and fusion foods. The flavor profile is savory and creamy, with a gooey texture that appeals to cheese lovers. It is often enjoyed as a comfort food, served in sandwiches, burgers, or as a standalone dish.

dishes.name: SPICY BEAN BURGER
dishes.description: A hearty and flavorful vegetarian patty made primarily from mashed beans, spices, and breadcrumbs, often mixed with onions, garlic, and herbs. The patty is typically pan-fried or grilled until crispy and served in a bun with fresh vegetables, condiments, and sometimes cheese. Originating from various global cuisines, this burger offers a savory and spicy profile, making it a popular choice for a quick, protein-packed meal or a satisfying snack.

dishes.name: VEGGIE BURGER
dishes.description: A Veggie Burger is a plant-based patty typically made from ingredients like beans, lentils, vegetables, and grains, served in a bun with various toppings. It is usually grilled or pan-fried, offering a savory and sometimes smoky flavor profile. Originating as a vegetarian alternative to the classic hamburger, it is enjoyed as a main course in casual dining settings, often accompanied by lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and condiments like ketchup or mustard.

dishes.name: MARGARITA
dishes.description: A classic margarita is a vibrant, tangy cocktail that is a staple in Mexican cuisine. It is primarily made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec or orange liqueur, often served with a salt-rimmed glass. The drink is typically enjoyed as an aperitif or a refreshing beverage at social gatherings and bars. Its crisp, citrusy flavor profile makes it a popular choice for those seeking a zesty and invigorating drink.

dishes.name: TUNA & ONION
dishes.description: Tuna & Onion is a simple yet flavorful dish featuring fresh tuna and crisp onions as its core ingredients. The tuna is typically pan-seared or grilled, while the onions are caramelized to bring out their natural sweetness. This dish is enjoyed in various cuisines, particularly as a light main course or a protein-rich addition to salads. Its flavor profile is a delightful balance of savory and slightly sweet, making it a versatile and satisfying meal option.

dishes.name: PEPPERONI
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a type of salami, classified as a sausage. It is typically made from cured pork and beef mixed together and seasoned with paprika or other chili pepper. This spicy, slightly smoky, and savory cured meat is often used as a topping for pizzas, in sandwiches, or enjoyed as a snack. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is a staple in American cuisine and is enjoyed for its bold, robust flavor.

dishes.name: 4 CHEESES
dishes.description: 4 Cheeses is a rich and indulgent dish featuring a blend of four distinct cheeses, typically including mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gorgonzola. These cheeses are often melted together to create a creamy, savory sauce that can be used in various preparations such as pasta, pizza, or a fondue. Originating from Italian cuisine, this dish offers a complex and comforting flavor profile that is both tangy and creamy. It is commonly enjoyed as a main course or a luxurious appetizer, perfect for cheese lovers and those seeking a decadent dining experience.

dishes.name: CALZONE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A Calzone is a type of Italian turnover that is made from dough similar to that of pizza. It is typically filled with ingredients such as cheese, meats, and vegetables, then folded and baked until golden. This dish is known for its savory and cheesy flavor profile, making it a popular main course or snack. It is often enjoyed as a handheld meal, perfect for a quick bite or a comforting dish.

dishes.name: HAWAIIAN
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Hawaiian cuisine is a vibrant fusion of indigenous, Asian, and Western influences, featuring fresh ingredients like pineapple, coconut, and seafood. Dishes such as loco moco, a hearty meal of rice, hamburger patty, fried egg, and gravy, or poke, a raw fish salad, showcase the island's unique flavors. Often enjoyed in casual settings, Hawaiian food reflects the Aloha spirit with its bold, tropical, and savory profiles.

dishes.name: ICE CREAM CORNET
dishes.description: A delightful frozen treat, the Ice Cream Cornet features creamy ice cream scooped into a crisp, cone-shaped pastry. The core ingredients include rich dairy-based ice cream and a buttery, flaky cornett pastry shell. This dessert is typically enjoyed as a sweet indulgence, often served at ice cream parlors, cafes, and as a popular street food. Its flavor profile is sweet and creamy, with the option for various ice cream flavors and toppings, making it a versatile and beloved treat worldwide.

dishes.name: WAFFLE & ICE CREAM
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Waffle & Ice Cream is a classic dessert featuring a crispy, golden waffle topped with creamy, cold ice cream. The waffle is typically baked until golden brown and served warm, providing a delightful contrast to the chilled ice cream. This sweet treat is often enjoyed as a dessert or snack, with optional toppings like chocolate sauce, fresh fruit, or whipped cream. Originating from Belgium, this combination has become a beloved indulgence worldwide.

dishes.name: APPLE PIE
dishes.description: Apple pie is a classic dessert featuring a flaky pastry crust filled with spiced apples, often sweetened with sugar and cinnamon. The apples are typically stewed or baked until tender, creating a warm, comforting filling. Originating in Europe, this beloved treat is enjoyed worldwide, often served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream. It's a staple at family gatherings and holiday celebrations, offering a perfect balance of sweet and tart flavors.

dishes.name: DONUT
dishes.description: A donut is a popular sweet snack made from deep-fried dough, often shaped in a ring. Core ingredients include flour, sugar, eggs, and yeast or baking powder for leavening. Donuts are typically glazed, frosted, or filled with sweet ingredients like jam or custard. Originating in the Netherlands as 'olykoeks', they are now enjoyed worldwide as a breakfast treat or dessert, often paired with coffee or tea.

dishes.name: BOTTLED WATER
dishes.description: Bottled water is a beverage consisting of water packaged in plastic or glass bottles. It is typically sourced from springs, purified tap water, or artesian wells. This refreshing drink is enjoyed worldwide as a daily staple, often consumed for hydration, especially during meals or physical activities.

dishes.name: SOFT DRINK CAN
dishes.description: A convenient, portable container typically made of aluminum or plastic, holding a variety of carbonated beverages. These drinks are often flavored with fruits, herbs, or other natural extracts and are sweetened with sugar or artificial sweeteners. Commonly enjoyed as a refreshing beverage, soft drink cans are a staple in daily meals, picnics, and social gatherings. They are typically served chilled and can be found in various sizes to suit different preferences.

dishes.name: ORANGE JUICE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Orange Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of juice from fresh oranges. Typically enjoyed chilled, it can be served plain or with added ingredients like ice, sugar, or other fruits. This popular drink is consumed worldwide, often as a breakfast staple or a thirst-quenching refreshment throughout the day. Its vibrant, tangy, and slightly sweet flavor profile makes it a beloved choice for all ages.

dishes.name: TEA or COFFEE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Tea is a beloved beverage made from steeping the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant in hot water. Originating in China, it is now enjoyed worldwide in various forms, including black, green, white, and oolong. Its flavor profile ranges from earthy and robust to delicate and floral, often enhanced with milk, sugar, or herbs. Served hot or iced, tea is a daily staple and a comforting ritual in many cultures.

It is typically grilled to perfection and served on a toasted brioche bun, often accompanied by lettuce, tomato, and a tangy burger sauce. Originating from American diner culture, this burger is a popular choice for a satisfying meal, enjoyed for its rich, savory flavors and indulgent combination of ingredients.

dishes.name: DOUBLE CHEESE
dishes.description: Double Cheese is a rich and indulgent snack or appetizer featuring a generous layering of melted cheese. Typically made with two types of cheese, such as mozzarella and cheddar, it is often baked or grilled to achieve a gooey, golden-brown texture. Popular in various cuisines, it can be served as a standalone dish or as a topping on burgers, pizzas, and sandwiches. The flavor profile is creamy, savory, and slightly tangy, making it a favorite among cheese lovers.

dishes.name: SPICY BEAN BURGER
dishes.description: A plant-based patty made from mashed beans, spices, and breadcrumbs, often mixed with vegetables like onions, garlic, and peppers. The patty is typically pan-fried or baked until crispy and served on a bun with fresh toppings such as lettuce, tomato, and spicy sauces. This dish is popular in various cuisines as a hearty, flavorful vegetarian or vegan alternative to traditional burgers, offering a savory and slightly spicy taste profile.

dishes.name: VEGGIE BURGER
dishes.description: A Veggie Burger is a plant-based twist on the classic burger, featuring a patty made from ingredients like beans, lentils, mushrooms, or vegetables, often bound with breadcrumbs or flaxseed. The patty is typically grilled or pan-fried and served in a bun with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and condiments such as ketchup, mustard, or avocado. Originating as a vegetarian and vegan alternative, it is enjoyed as a main course in casual dining settings, offering a savory and hearty flavor profile.

dishes.name: MARGARITA
dishes.description: A classic cocktail, the Margarita is a refreshing beverage made with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec. Served chilled, often with a salted rim, it balances sweet, tart, and tangy flavors. This iconic drink has Mexican origins and is enjoyed as an aperitif or celebratory beverage worldwide.

dishes.name: TUNA & ONION
dishes.description: Tuna & Onion is a simple yet flavorful dish featuring fresh tuna steaks or fillets cooked with caramelized onions. The tuna is typically pan-seared or grilled to perfection, while the onions are saut√©ed until golden and sweet. This dish is enjoyed as a main course, often accompanied by a side of vegetables or a fresh salad. It offers a delightful combination of savory and slightly sweet flavors, making it a popular choice for a quick and nutritious meal.

dishes.name: PEPPERONI
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a type of salami, classified as a sausage. It is typically made from cured pork and beef mixed with paprika or other chili pepper. This spicy, smoky, and slightly tangy sausage is often used as a topping for pizzas or added to sandwiches. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is a staple in American cuisine and enjoyed as a flavorful addition to various dishes.

dishes.name: 4 CHEESES
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. 4 Cheeses is a rich and indulgent pizza variety, featuring a blend of four distinct cheeses: mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and provolone. The cheeses are layered on a classic pizza base, creating a gooey, flavorful topping that is baked to perfection. Originating from Italian-American cuisine, this pizza offers a savory and creamy flavor profile, making it a popular choice for pizza lovers. It is typically enjoyed as a main course, either in pizzerias or at home, and pairs well with a side of garlic bread or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: CALZONE
dishes.description: A calzone is an Italian turnover made from pizza dough, stuffed with ingredients such as cheese, meats, and vegetables, then baked until golden and crispy. Originating from Southern Italy, it offers a savory and hearty flavor profile, often enjoyed as a main course or a substantial snack. The folded design ensures a delightful mix of textures and flavors in every bite.

dishes.name: HAWAIIAN
dishes.description: Hawaiian cuisine is a vibrant fusion of indigenous Polynesian, Asian, and American influences. Core ingredients include fresh fish like mahi-mahi and ahi tuna, tropical fruits such as pineapple and mango, and staples like taro and sweet potatoes. Dishes are often grilled, steamed, or baked, with flavors ranging from savory to sweet, and are commonly enjoyed in casual settings or as part of festive luaus. The cuisine reflects Hawaii's rich cultural heritage and the abundance of local produce.

dishes.name: ICE CREAM CORNET
dishes.description: A delightful frozen dessert featuring creamy ice cream scooped into a crisp, cone-shaped wafer. The cornet is typically made from layered, baked dough rolled into a cone shape and filled with various ice cream flavors. Originating from Europe, it is enjoyed worldwide as a sweet treat, often served in ice cream parlors, cafes, or as a refreshing snack on hot days. The combination of cold, creamy ice cream and a crunchy, buttery cone creates a satisfying contrast in texture and flavor.

dishes.name: WAFFLE & ICE CREAM
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Waffle & Ice Cream is a popular dessert featuring crispy, golden-brown waffles topped with a scoop of creamy ice cream. The waffles are typically made from a batter of flour, eggs, milk, and baking powder, then cooked on a special waffle iron. This sweet treat is often enjoyed with additional toppings like syrup, fresh fruit, or whipped cream, making it a delightful indulgence for any occasion.

dishes.name: APPLE PIE
dishes.description: A classic American dessert, apple pie features a flaky pastry crust filled with spiced apples, typically cinnamon, sugar, and sometimes nutmeg. The apples are usually sliced or diced and baked until tender, creating a sweet and aromatic filling. Served warm, often with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream, it's a beloved treat enjoyed year-round, especially during holidays.

dishes.name: DONUT
dishes.description: A donut is a popular sweet treat, typically classified as a dessert or snack. It is made from a sweetened dough that is deep-fried and often coated with sugar or glazed. Originating in the Netherlands, donuts are now enjoyed worldwide in various forms, from classic ring-shaped to filled and topped varieties. The flavor profile is predominantly sweet, with variations including chocolate, cinnamon, and fruit glazes. Donuts are commonly enjoyed as a breakfast item, snack, or dessert.

dishes.name: BOTTLED WATER
dishes.description: Bottled water is a beverage consisting primarily of purified water that has been packaged in plastic or glass bottles. It is often sourced from natural springs or municipal water supplies and undergoes filtration and treatment processes. This refreshing drink is enjoyed worldwide as a daily staple, providing hydration in various settings, from casual meals to outdoor activities.

dishes.name: SOFT DRINK CAN
dishes.description: A soft drink can is a sealed container typically made of aluminum, holding a variety of carbonated beverages. The core ingredients include carbonated water, sweeteners, and flavorings, which vary by brand and type. These beverages are enjoyed chilled and are commonly consumed as a refreshing drink, often paired with meals or snacks. Soft drink cans are popular worldwide and are a staple in both casual and festive settings.

dishes.name: ORANGE JUICE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Orange Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of juice from fresh oranges. The main ingredient is, of course, oranges, which are typically peeled, segmented, and then juiced. This beverage is enjoyed worldwide, often as a breakfast drink or a refreshing thirst-quencher throughout the day. It is known for its sweet and tangy flavor, which can be adjusted by adding sugar or other sweeteners. Orange Juice can be served chilled or at room temperature, and it's a popular choice for both daily consumption and special occasions.

dishes.name: TEA or COFFEE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Tea is a beloved beverage made from steeping the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant in hot water. Originating in China, it is enjoyed worldwide in various forms, including black, green, white, oolong, and herbal infusions. With a flavor profile ranging from earthy and robust to floral and delicate, tea is savored hot or iced, often accompanied by sweeteners or milk. It is a staple in daily routines, social gatherings, and cultural rituals.

dishes.name: Tuna Nigiri
dishes.description: Tuna Nigiri is a classic Japanese sushi dish featuring hand-pressed vinegared rice topped with fresh, raw tuna. The tuna is typically sliced into thick, rectangular pieces and placed atop the rice, sometimes brushed with a touch of soy sauce or wasabi for added flavor. This elegant and simple preparation highlights the natural taste of the fish, making it a popular choice in sushi restaurants and a staple in Japanese cuisine. Served as part of a larger sushi platter or as an individual piece, it's enjoyed for its clean, savory taste and delicate texture.

dishes.name: Salmon Nigiri
dishes.description: Salmon Nigiri is a type of sushi, specifically a main course or appetizer, featuring vinegared rice topped with a slice of fresh salmon. Originating from Japan, this dish highlights the delicate, savory flavors of the salmon complemented by the subtle tang of the rice. It is typically enjoyed as part of a sushi meal, often accompanied by soy sauce and wasabi.

dishes.name: BEEF STEAK
dishes.description: Beef Steak is a classic main course dish featuring a thick, tender cut of beef, typically from the ribeye, sirloin, or filet mignon. The beef is seasoned and seared or grilled to perfection, often finished with a rich sauce like peppercorn, b√©arnaise, or red wine reduction. Originating from Western cuisine, it is savory and succulent, best enjoyed as a hearty meal, often accompanied by sides like mashed potatoes, roasted vegetables, or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: CHICKEN STEAK
dishes.description: Chicken steak is a hearty main course featuring tender, marinated chicken breast or thigh meat, often grilled, pan-seared, or baked to perfection. Core ingredients include chicken, herbs, spices, and a flavorful marinade, which may include ingredients like garlic, lemon, and olive oil. Originating from various cuisines, it is enjoyed for its savory and sometimes slightly charred flavor, often served with sides like vegetables, mashed potatoes, or a fresh salad. This versatile dish is a staple in both home cooking and restaurants, appreciated for its simplicity and delicious taste.

dishes.name: TUNA STEAK
dishes.description: Tuna steak is a main course dish featuring a thick, boneless cut of tuna, typically grilled, seared, or pan-fried to achieve a tender interior and a slightly crispy exterior. The core ingredients include fresh tuna, olive oil, salt, and pepper, often accompanied by herbs like thyme or rosemary. Originating from various coastal regions, this dish is celebrated for its rich, savory flavor and is commonly enjoyed as a healthy and protein-packed meal, often paired with sides like vegetables or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: SALMON FILLET
dishes.description: Salmon fillet is a main course dish featuring a boneless cut of salmon, typically prepared by grilling, baking, or pan-searing. The core ingredients include fresh salmon, olive oil, and a variety of seasonings such as lemon, garlic, and herbs. Originating from coastal regions, this dish is enjoyed for its rich, savory flavor and tender texture. It is often served as part of a healthy, protein-rich meal, accompanied by vegetables or a side salad.

dishes.name: RIBEYE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Ribeye is a premium cut of beef, prized for its rich, beefy flavor and tender texture. It is typically grilled, pan-seared, or broiled to perfection, often seasoned simply with salt and pepper to highlight its natural taste. Originating from the rib section of the cow, this steak is a staple in American and international cuisine, best enjoyed as a main course, often accompanied by classic sides like mashed potatoes or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: PORTERHOUSE STEAK
dishes.description: A hearty main course featuring a thick-cut steak from the rear end of the short loin and tenderloin, known for its T-bone separation. The porterhouse steak is typically grilled or pan-seared to a perfect medium-rare, highlighting its rich, beefy flavor and juicy texture. Originating from the United States, this classic dish is often seasoned simply with salt and pepper, allowing the natural taste of the meat to shine. It's commonly served with classic accompaniments like mashed potatoes, creamed spinach, or a robust red wine reduction, making it a staple in American steakhouses and a favorite for special occasions.

dishes.name: T-BONE STEAK
dishes.description: A classic American steakhouse staple, the T-Bone Steak is a thick-cut, bone-in steak featuring a distinctive T-shaped bone with meat on both sides. The tenderloin and strip steak sections offer a perfect balance of flavors and textures. Grilled to perfection and seasoned simply with salt and pepper, it's often served with classic accompaniments like mashed potatoes, creamed spinach, or a rich red wine reduction. This hearty main course is a favorite for special occasions and steak lovers alike.

dishes.name: TNEW YORK STRIP
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. The New York Strip is a classic steak dish, known for its tender texture and rich, beefy flavor. This main course features a thick-cut strip steak, typically from the short loin, seasoned simply with salt and pepper, then grilled or broiled to perfection. Originating from the United States, it is often served with classic accompaniments like mashed potatoes, roasted vegetables, or a creamy peppercorn sauce, making it a staple in American steakhouse cuisine.

dishes.name: PASTA
dishes.description: Pasta is a staple main course dish originating from Italian cuisine, featuring dough made from wheat flour and water, typically formed into strings or other shapes. It is often boiled and served with a variety of sauces, such as tomato, cream, or pesto, and can be garnished with meats, vegetables, or cheese. Pasta is enjoyed worldwide as a versatile and comforting daily meal, offering a savory and satisfying flavor profile.

dishes.name: SPAGHETTI
dishes.description: Spaghetti is a classic Italian dish featuring long, thin pasta strands typically tossed with a savory tomato-based sauce, garlic, olive oil, and herbs like basil. It can also be served with meat sauces such as Bolognese or carbonara. This versatile dish is a staple in Italian cuisine and is enjoyed as a main course, often accompanied by grated cheese and a side of garlic bread.

dishes.name: MINERAL WATER
dishes.description: Mineral water is a clear, refreshing beverage sourced from natural springs or underground reservoirs. It contains essential minerals like calcium, magnesium, and potassium, which contribute to its distinct taste. Often enjoyed chilled, it is a popular choice for hydration and is commonly served as a standalone drink or paired with meals.

dishes.name: ORANGE JUICE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Orange Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of juice from fresh oranges. This tangy and sweet drink is enjoyed worldwide, often as a breakfast staple or a revitalizing midday pick-me-up. It can be served chilled or at room temperature, sometimes with added sweeteners or spices like cinnamon for extra flavor. Whether homemade or store-bought, orange juice is a beloved beverage that offers a burst of citrusy goodness.

dishes.name: MILKSHAKE
dishes.description: A creamy, sweet beverage made by blending milk, ice cream, and various flavorings such as fruit, chocolate, or vanilla. It is typically served chilled in a tall glass, often garnished with whipped cream and a cherry. Enjoyed as a refreshing treat or dessert, milkshakes are popular worldwide, with variations reflecting local tastes and ingredients.

dishes.name: ICE TEA
dishes.description: Ice tea is a refreshing beverage made from brewed tea, served chilled over ice. Core ingredients include black or green tea leaves, water, sugar, and often lemon or other fruit flavors. It is typically prepared by steeping tea leaves in hot water, sweetening the mixture, and then cooling it down before serving over ice. Originating from various cultures, ice tea is enjoyed worldwide as a popular summer drink, often accompanied by meals or as a standalone refreshing beverage.

dishes.name: HOT TEA
dishes.description: Hot tea is a comforting beverage made from steeping tea leaves in hot water. Core ingredients include tea leaves, which can be black, green, or herbal, and hot water. It is often enjoyed with optional additions like milk, sugar, or honey. Originating from ancient China, hot tea is now a global staple, savored for its soothing warmth and diverse flavor profiles, ranging from earthy to floral. It is commonly served as a daily drink, a pick-me-up, or a social ritual.

dishes.name: ICE CHOCOLATE
dishes.description: Ice Chocolate is a delightful frozen dessert that combines the richness of chocolate with the refreshing coolness of ice. Made primarily from cocoa, sugar, and cream, it is often blended and frozen to achieve a smooth, creamy texture. This treat is popular in various forms across different cultures, from chocolate ice cream to frozen chocolate desserts. It is typically enjoyed as a sweet snack or dessert, offering a sweet and creamy flavor profile that is both indulgent and refreshing.

dishes.name: HOT CHOCOLATE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Hot chocolate is a comforting beverage made from melted chocolate, milk, and sugar. It is typically prepared by heating the ingredients together until smooth and frothy. Originating from Mesoamerica, it is now enjoyed worldwide as a sweet, indulgent drink, often savored during cold weather or as an after-dinner treat.

dishes.name: JUICE
dishes.description: Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of liquid from fruits, vegetables, or other plant materials. Core ingredients include fresh fruits like oranges, apples, or berries, and may be combined with water, sweeteners, or other flavorings. Preparation involves blending or pressing the ingredients to release their juices, which are then often strained and served chilled. Juices are enjoyed worldwide as a daily drink, breakfast accompaniment, or a healthy snack, offering a burst of natural flavors and nutrients.

dishes.name: COCKTAIL
dishes.description: A cocktail is a mixed drink typically served as an alcoholic beverage. Core ingredients include spirits such as vodka, rum, or gin, mixed with other ingredients like fruit juices, sodas, or liqueurs. Preparation methods vary widely, often involving shaking, stirring, or layering components in a glass. Originating from various cultures, cocktails offer a diverse flavor profile ranging from sweet and tangy to bitter and herbal. They are commonly enjoyed as aperitifs, after-dinner drinks, or social beverages in bars and restaurants.

dishes.name: ICE MILK
dishes.description: Ice Milk is a refreshing frozen dessert, typically enjoyed as a sweet treat or beverage. It is made primarily from milk, sugar, and sometimes flavored with ingredients like vanilla, fruit, or chocolate. The mixture is frozen and churned to create a smooth, creamy texture. Originating from various cultures, it is often served as a cooling snack or dessert, especially during hot weather.

dishes.description: A Porterhouse steak is a hearty main course featuring a thick-cut portion of beef that includes both the tenderloin and the strip steak, separated by a distinctive T-shaped bone. This premium cut is typically grilled or pan-seared to perfection, showcasing a rich, savory flavor with a juicy, tender texture. Originating from the United States, it is often enjoyed as a centerpiece for a classic American meal, paired with sides like mashed potatoes or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: T-BONE STEAK
dishes.description: A classic American steak cut featuring a T-shaped bone with tenderloin on one side and strip steak on the other. Often seasoned simply with salt and pepper to highlight the natural taste of the beef, it's a beloved main course, typically served with classic accompaniments like mashed potatoes, grilled vegetables, or a fresh salad.

dishes.description: Pan Chai is a traditional Indian street beverage known for its invigorating blend of spices and tea. The core ingredients include black tea leaves, ginger, cardamom, cloves, and a touch of sugar or jaggery, all brewed together in a pan. This spiced tea is typically prepared by boiling the ingredients in water and then simmering them to extract the rich flavors. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, Pan Chai is enjoyed for its warm, aromatic, and slightly sweet taste, making it a popular choice for a quick energy boost or a comforting drink on chilly days. Its light, refreshing taste and health benefits make it a beloved choice for many.

dishes.name: HOT BOURNVITA
dishes.description: Hot Bournvita is a warm, comforting beverage made primarily from Bournvita powder, a malted drink mix, combined with hot milk and sugar. This popular drink is often enjoyed as a bedtime beverage or a morning pick-me-up, particularly favored by children and adults alike. dishes.name: SUGER FREE CHAI
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Sugar Free Chai is a health-conscious twist on the traditional Indian spiced tea, designed for those monitoring their sugar intake. dishes.name: HOT COFFEE
