The core ingredients include flour, butter, sugar, and fresh orange zest or juice, often enhanced with vanilla or cinnamon. These cookies are typically baked until golden and enjoyed as a sweet treat with tea or coffee, perfect for any occasion.

dishes.name: Muffins
dishes.description: Muffins are small, individual-sized baked goods that can be either sweet or savory. Typically made with flour, sugar, eggs, and milk, they often include various add-ins like fruits, nuts, or chocolate chips. Baked in a muffin tin, they have a distinctive domed top and a tender crumb. Enjoyed as a breakfast item, snack, or dessert, muffins are versatile and popular worldwide.

dishes.name: Fruit juice
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Fruit juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of natural juices from fresh fruits. It can be prepared by blending or squeezing fruits and then straining the pulp to achieve a smooth consistency. Enjoyed worldwide, fruit juice is often served chilled and can be consumed as a daily drink or a part of a meal. It offers a sweet and tangy flavor profile, depending on the type of fruit used.

dishes.name: Lemonade
dishes.description: Lemonade is a refreshing beverage made primarily from lemons, water, and sugar. It is typically prepared by squeezing fresh lemon juice, mixing it with water, and sweetening it to taste. This tangy and sweet drink is enjoyed worldwide, often as a cooling accompaniment to meals or a standalone thirst-quencher, especially during hot weather.

dishes.name: Smoothies
dishes.description: Smoothies are refreshing blended beverages typically made from a combination of fruits, vegetables, yogurt, milk, or juice. They are often sweetened with honey, sugar, or other natural sweeteners and can be enhanced with ingredients like nuts, seeds, or protein powder. Originating from various cultures, smoothies are enjoyed as a healthy snack or breakfast option, offering a vibrant and nutritious way to start the day or enjoy a quick, energizing treat.

dishes.name: Fresh Juice
dishes.description: Fresh Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the liquid extracted from fruits or vegetables. Core ingredients typically include a variety of fresh fruits like oranges, apples, or berries, and sometimes vegetables like carrots or cucumbers. It is prepared by blending or squeezing the ingredients and then straining to remove pulp. Fresh Juice is enjoyed worldwide and is known for its vibrant, naturally sweet, and tangy flavor profile. It is commonly served as a daily beverage, often at breakfast or as a healthy snack.

dishes.name: Coffee
dishes.description: Coffee is a beloved beverage made from roasted coffee beans, typically brewed with hot water. Originating from Ethiopia, it is enjoyed worldwide in various forms, such as espresso, latte, or cold brew. Its rich, aromatic flavor profile ranges from bitter to sweet, often accompanied by creamy textures in milk-based drinks. Served in cafes, homes, and workplaces, coffee is a staple for many, providing a comforting and energizing experience.

dishes.name: Black tea
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Black tea is a type of tea that is more oxidized than oolong, green, and white teas. It is generally prepared by infusing the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant in hot water. Originating from China, black tea is now enjoyed globally, often with added milk and sugar. Its robust and full-bodied flavor profile makes it a popular beverage for daily consumption, served hot or iced.

dishes.name: Herbal tea
dishes.description: Herbal tea is a beverage made from the infusion of various dried herbs, flowers, or fruits in hot water. It is typically caffeine-free and enjoyed for its soothing and health benefits. Common ingredients include chamomile, peppermint, ginger, and hibiscus, each offering unique flavors and properties. This tea is often consumed as a daily drink, either hot or iced, and can be sweetened or flavored to taste.

dishes.name: Lentil sauce with herbs
dishes.description: Lentil Sauce with Herbs is a hearty, savory dish featuring lentils as the core ingredient, simmered to a rich, creamy consistency. Fresh herbs like parsley, cilantro, or mint are added to enhance the flavor, often accompanied by garlic, onions, and a touch of lemon for brightness. This versatile dish is commonly enjoyed as a main course or side, particularly in Mediterranean and Middle Eastern cuisines. It pairs well with rice, bread, or vegetables, offering a comforting and nutritious meal.

dishes.name: Risotto soup

Made with Arborio rice, broth, and a blend of savory ingredients like onions, garlic, and Parmesan cheese, it offers a velvety texture and deep umami flavor. Often garnished with herbs and sometimes seafood or vegetables, this dish is enjoyed as a hearty main course, particularly in Italian cuisine. It's perfect for a cozy meal, served warm and paired with a crisp salad or crusty bread.

dishes.name: Green soup of vegetables

dishes.name: Fysoli soup

It features chickpeas as the core ingredient, simmered with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices like cumin and paprika. The soup is slow-cooked to develop a rich, savory flavor profile with a hint of smokiness. Often served with crusty bread, it's a comforting and hearty meal, popular in Cypriot households and tavernas.

dishes.name: Asparagus soup
dishes.description: Asparagus Soup is a light, flavorful soup that showcases the delicate taste of fresh asparagus. The main ingredients include asparagus spears, onions, garlic, and often a touch of cream or butter for richness. It is typically prepared by saut√©ing the vegetables, adding broth, and simmering until the asparagus is tender. This soup is enjoyed as a starter or a light main course, offering a savory and slightly earthy flavor profile. It is popular in various cuisines, particularly in European and American cooking.

dishes.name: Buckwheat cutlets
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Buckwheat cutlets are savory, pan-fried patties made primarily from buckwheat flour, mixed with vegetables, herbs, and spices. These vegetables are typically marinated in a blend of olive oil, herbs, and spices, then grilled to perfection, imparting a smoky and charred flavor. This dish is enjoyed worldwide, often as a vegetarian or vegan option, and can be served as a standalone meal or accompanied by grains like rice or quinoa. Its savory and slightly smoky profile makes it a versatile and nutritious choice for any occasion.

dishes.name: Eggplant in sauce
dishes.description: Eggplant in Sauce is a hearty main course featuring tender eggplant simmered in a rich, flavorful sauce. Typically made with tomatoes, onions, garlic, and a blend of spices, it can be prepared in various regional styles, such as Italian rag√π or Middle Eastern baba ganoush-inspired versions. dishes.name: Mushroom julienne
dishes.description: Mushroom julienne is a delicate and flavorful side dish or appetizer featuring thinly sliced mushrooms saut√©ed to perfection. dishes.name: Rice risotto
dishes.description: Rice Risotto is a creamy and comforting Italian main course made primarily with Arborio rice, broth, butter, and Parmesan cheese. The rice is slowly cooked by adding warm broth gradually, allowing it to absorb and release its starch, creating a rich and velvety texture. This versatile dish can be flavored with various ingredients like mushrooms, seafood, or vegetables, and is typically served as a hearty meal, often accompanied by a glass of white wine.

dishes.description: Baked fish is a main course dish featuring fish fillets or whole fish baked to perfection. dishes.name: Carrot chees

dishes.name: With mushrooms

dishes.name: Spicy chicken
dishes.description: Spicy chicken is a flavorful main course featuring tender chicken pieces marinated and cooked with a blend of aromatic spices, chili peppers, and herbs. The dish is typically fried, grilled, or stir-fried to achieve a crispy exterior and juicy interior. Originating from various global cuisines, it offers a bold, fiery flavor profile that can be enjoyed as a standalone meal or with rice and vegetables. This dish is popular in both home cooking and street food settings, providing a satisfying and hearty option for spice enthusiasts.

dishes.name: Hot dog
dishes.description: A hot dog is a popular American street food consisting of a cooked sausage, typically beef or pork, served in a sliced bun. It is often topped with condiments like mustard, ketchup, onions, and relish. The sausage is usually steamed or grilled, and the dish is enjoyed as a quick, savory snack or light meal at sporting events, barbecues, and casual gatherings.

dishes.name: Fruit Salad
dishes.description: A refreshing and colorful dish, fruit salad is a delightful mix of seasonal fruits, often including apples, oranges, bananas, grapes, and berries. Typically tossed with a light dressing of lemon juice, honey, or a sprinkle of mint, it is enjoyed as a healthy snack, dessert, or breakfast option. Originating from various cultures, this dish is celebrated for its natural sweetness and vibrant flavors, making it a versatile and nutritious choice.

dishes.name: Cocktails
dishes.description: Cocktails are a type of mixed drink typically served as an aperitif or dessert. They are made with a combination of spirits, liqueurs, and other ingredients such as fruit juices, sodas, or cream. Cocktails can be shaken, stirred, or blended and are often garnished with fruits, herbs, or spices. Originating from the United States, they are enjoyed worldwide in social settings, parties, and bars. The flavor profile varies widely, ranging from sweet and fruity to sour and strong.

dishes.name: Nuggets
dishes.description: Nuggets are bite-sized pieces of meat, typically chicken, that are breaded and deep-fried or baked. They are a popular snack or appetizer, often served with dipping sauces like ketchup, barbecue, or honey mustard. Originating in the United States, nuggets are enjoyed worldwide for their crispy exterior and tender, savory interior, making them a favorite among both children and adults.

dishes.name: Sandwich
dishes.description: A sandwich is a versatile main course or snack made by layering various fillings between slices of bread. Core ingredients often include meats, cheeses, vegetables, and condiments, with preparation methods ranging from simple assembly to grilling or toasting. Originating from Europe, sandwiches are enjoyed worldwide in diverse forms, offering a savory and customizable flavor profile. They are commonly served as a quick meal, lunch, or snack, either at home, in cafes, or as street food.

dishes.name: French Fries
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. French Fries are a popular snack or side dish made from deep-fried potatoes that have been cut into elongated pieces. Originating from Belgium, they are typically seasoned with salt and served hot, often accompanied by ketchup, mayonnaise, or other dipping sauces. Their crispy exterior and soft interior make them a beloved comfort food enjoyed worldwide.

dishes.name: Milk Shake
dishes.description: A refreshing beverage made from a blend of milk, ice cream, and flavored syrups or fruits. It is typically whipped until frothy and served chilled in a tall glass, often garnished with whipped cream or a cherry. Originating in the United States, milkshakes are enjoyed as a sweet treat or a dessert accompaniment, offering a creamy and sweet flavor profile.

dishes.name: Iced Tea
dishes.description: Iced tea is a refreshing beverage made by brewing tea leaves and then cooling the resulting liquid over ice. It typically includes black or green tea, sweetened with sugar or honey, and often flavored with lemon, mint, or other fruits. Originating from various cultures, it is commonly enjoyed as a daily drink, especially in warmer climates, and can be savored plain or with added flavors.

dishes.name: Orange Juice
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A refreshing beverage made from the juice of fresh oranges, often enjoyed for its natural sweetness and tangy flavor. It can be served chilled or at room temperature, and is commonly consumed as a breakfast drink or a refreshing pick-me-up throughout the day. The simplicity of its preparation involves squeezing oranges and straining the juice, sometimes with added water or ice for dilution and cooling.

dishes.name: Lemon Tea
dishes.description: Lemon Tea is a refreshing beverage made from brewed tea infused with lemon juice and sweetened to taste. It is typically prepared by steeping tea leaves in hot water, then adding fresh lemon juice and sugar or honey. Originating from various cultures, this tangy and invigorating drink is enjoyed hot or cold, often as a daily pick-me-up or a soothing accompaniment to meals.

dishes.name: Coffee
dishes.description: Coffee is a beloved beverage made from brewed coffee beans, offering a rich and aromatic flavor profile. Typically prepared by roasting, grinding, and brewing the beans, it can be enjoyed black or with added milk, sugar, or various flavorings. Originating from Ethiopia, coffee is now a global staple, served hot or iced, and is often a daily ritual for many, providing a stimulating and comforting experience.

dishes.name: FRIES

A beloved snack or side dish, they are often seasoned with salt and served with ketchup or other dipping sauces. Originating from Belgium, fries are now enjoyed worldwide as a staple of fast food and casual dining.

dishes.name: PEPPER POTATOES
dishes.description: Pepper Potatoes is a flavorful side dish featuring crispy potatoes tossed in a spicy and aromatic blend of black pepper, garlic, and other spices. The potatoes are typically pan-fried or roasted to achieve a golden-brown exterior while remaining tender inside. Originating from various cuisines, this dish is enjoyed for its savory and slightly spicy flavor profile, making it a perfect accompaniment to grilled meats or a standalone snack.

dishes.name: GREEN SALAD
dishes.description: A fresh and vibrant starter, green salad is a medley of crisp lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, and onions, often tossed with a tangy vinaigrette or creamy dressing. This versatile dish is commonly enjoyed as a side or appetizer, offering a refreshing contrast to heartier meals. Originating from various cultures, it's a staple in Western cuisine, celebrated for its light, crisp, and tangy flavors.

dishes.name: COLESLAW
dishes.description: Coleslaw is a refreshing side dish made primarily from shredded raw cabbage, often combined with carrots and other vegetables. It is typically dressed with a creamy mayonnaise-based sauce or a tangy vinegar dressing, and may include spices like celery seeds or black pepper. Originating from the Dutch and popularized in the United States, coleslaw is known for its crunchy texture and cool, tangy flavor. It is commonly served as a side dish with fried chicken, barbecue, or sandwiches, adding a crisp and refreshing contrast to rich, savory meals.

dishes.name: JACKET POTATO
dishes.description: A hearty and comforting dish, a Jacket Potato features a whole baked potato with its skin on, typically seasoned with salt and cooked until tender. It is often served with a variety of toppings such as sour cream, cheese, bacon bits, or chives. Originating from the United Kingdom, this dish is enjoyed as a main course or a substantial snack, offering a savory and satisfying flavor profile.

dishes.name: ONION RINGS
dishes.description: Crispy and golden, onion rings are a popular snack or appetizer made from thick slices of onion coated in a seasoned batter or breading and deep-fried to perfection. Originating in North America, they boast a savory, slightly sweet flavor with a satisfying crunch. Often served with a side of dipping sauce like ranch or ketchup, they are a favorite at fast-food chains and casual dining spots.

dishes.name: FRIED BEANS
dishes.description: Fried beans are a simple yet satisfying dish featuring beans cooked in oil until crispy and tender. Common ingredients include green beans, soy sauce, garlic, and chili, creating a savory and slightly spicy flavor profile. Popular in various Asian cuisines, this dish is often enjoyed as a side or a quick snack, offering a delightful crunch with every bite.

dishes.name: BANANA SPLIT
dishes.description: A classic American dessert featuring a split banana as its base, layered with scoops of vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry ice cream. Topped with whipped cream, crushed nuts, and a drizzle of chocolate or caramel sauce, it's a sweet and indulgent treat. Typically served in a long dish to showcase the colorful layers, it's a popular choice at ice cream parlors and diners.

dishes.name: CHERRY PIE
dishes.description: Cherry pie is a classic dessert featuring a flaky, buttery crust filled with sweet and tart cherries. The cherries are typically stewed with sugar and sometimes a touch of lemon or almond extract to enhance their flavor. Baked until golden, the pie is often served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream. This beloved treat is a staple in American cuisine, especially popular during summer cherry season and holiday gatherings.

dishes.name: CHOCO BUDOIR
dishes.description: Choco Boudoir is a delightful dessert featuring layers of moist chocolate sponge cake and rich chocolate cream. The cake is baked to perfection, then sliced and assembled with the cream to create a decadent treat. Originating from French patisserie traditions, it offers a sweet, creamy, and indulgent flavor profile. This elegant dessert is often enjoyed as a sweet finale to a meal or as a luxurious snack.

dishes.name: COOKIE DELIGHT
dishes.description: Cookie Delight is a sweet, indulgent dessert featuring a rich, buttery cookie base topped with a creamy, velvety frosting. The core ingredients include flour, sugar, butter, eggs, and vanilla extract for the cookie, while the frosting typically consists of butter, powdered sugar, and vanilla. This treat is baked to golden perfection and enjoyed as a delightful snack or dessert, often served at parties or as a comforting indulgence.

dishes.name: APPLE PIE
dishes.description: Apple pie is a classic dessert featuring a flaky pastry crust filled with spiced apples, often cinnamon, sugar, and sometimes nutmeg. The apples are typically stewed or baked until tender, creating a sweet and aromatic filling. Originating from Europe, this beloved treat is enjoyed warm or cold, often accompanied by a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream. It's a staple at family gatherings and holidays, embodying comfort and tradition.

dishes.name: FRUIT SMOOTHIE
dishes.description: A refreshing beverage made by blending a variety of fresh fruits with yogurt, milk, or a dairy-free alternative. Common ingredients include bananas, berries, mangoes, and apples, often sweetened with honey or sugar. This nutritious drink is typically enjoyed as a breakfast item or a healthy snack, offering a vibrant mix of sweet and tangy flavors.

dishes.name: CHOCOLATE MUFFIN
dishes.description: A chocolate muffin is a sweet, baked good made primarily from flour, sugar, eggs, and cocoa powder, often enriched with chocolate chips or chunks. These individual-sized treats are typically enjoyed as a dessert or snack, either plain or with additions like nuts or dried fruits. Originating from North America, chocolate muffins are a popular choice for breakfast or an afternoon pick-me-up, offering a rich, indulgent flavor profile that's both comforting and satisfying.

dishes.name: SOFT DRINKS
dishes.description: Soft drinks are non-alcoholic, carbonated beverages typically enjoyed for their refreshing and sweet flavors. These drinks are made with a combination of carbonated water, sweeteners, and various flavorings, often including citrus, cola, or fruit extracts. They are commonly served chilled and are popular accompaniments to meals or enjoyed as standalone refreshments. Soft drinks are widely consumed globally and are available in a variety of brands and flavors.

dishes.name: BEER
dishes.description: Beer is a popular alcoholic beverage with a rich history and diverse regional variations. Core ingredients include water, malted barley, hops, and yeast, which undergo fermentation to create its distinctive flavor. Brewed through a process of mashing, boiling, fermenting, and conditioning, beer can range from light and crisp to dark and malty. Originating in ancient Mesopotamia, beer is now enjoyed globally, often as a social drink or accompaniment to meals.

dishes.name: GLASS OF WINE
dishes.description: A glass of wine is a beverage typically served in a wine glass. It can be made from various types of grapes and can be red, white, ros√©, or sparkling. The flavor profile varies widely depending on the type of wine, ranging from dry and crisp to sweet and fruity. It is often enjoyed as an accompaniment to meals or as a standalone drink during social gatherings.

dishes.name: CIDER
dishes.description: Cider is a refreshing beverage made from fermented apple juice, offering a crisp and slightly sweet flavor profile. It originates from various regions, including Europe and North America, where it is often enjoyed chilled. This effervescent drink can be served as a standalone beverage or paired with meals, particularly in autumn and winter seasons. It comes in both alcoholic and non-alcoholic varieties, catering to a wide range of preferences.

dishes.name: BOTTLED WATER
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Bottled water is a beverage consisting of water packaged in plastic or glass bottles. It is typically sourced from springs, wells, or municipal water supplies and undergoes purification processes. Bottled water is enjoyed worldwide as a refreshing and convenient drink, suitable for daily hydration and various occasions.

dishes.name: FRESH JUICE
dishes.description: Fresh Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of natural juices from fruits or vegetables. Core ingredients include a variety of fresh produce like oranges, apples, carrots, or a mix of seasonal fruits, often combined with water, ice, and sometimes a touch of sweetener. This drink is typically prepared by blending or squeezing the ingredients to release their natural juices, then straining and serving chilled. Originating from various cultures worldwide, Fresh Juice offers a vibrant, sweet, and tangy flavor profile that is enjoyed as a healthy daily beverage or a rejuvenating accompaniment to meals.

dishes.name: TEA OR COFFEE
dishes.description: Tea or coffee are popular beverages enjoyed worldwide. Tea is typically brewed from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant and can be served hot or cold, with variations like black, green, or herbal tea. Coffee is made from roasted coffee beans and is often brewed or brewed using methods like drip, espresso, or French press. Both beverages are enjoyed for their distinct flavors and stimulating effects, often accompanying meals or providing a comforting break throughout the day.

Its flavor profile ranges from earthy and robust to delicate and floral, often enhanced with milk, sugar, or herbs. Served hot or iced, tea is a daily staple and a cultural ritual in many societies.

dishes.name: Chilli Chicken
dishes.description: Chilli Chicken is a popular Indo-Chinese dish featuring tender chicken pieces stir-fried with bell peppers, onions, and a blend of spices. The dish is known for its spicy, savory, and slightly tangy flavor profile, achieved through the use of chilli sauce, soy sauce, and garlic. Typically served as a main course or a snack, it is a favorite in Indian-Chinese cuisine and is often enjoyed with fried rice or noodles.

dishes.name: Butter Masala Chicken
dishes.description: Butter Masala Chicken is a rich and flavorful Indian dish. It features tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy, enriched with butter, cream, and aromatic spices. This main course dish is popular in North Indian cuisine and is known for its savory and slightly sweet flavor profile. It is typically served with naan, roti, or steamed rice, making it a hearty and satisfying meal.

dishes.name: Chilli Paneer
dishes.description: Chilli Paneer is a popular Indian vegetarian dish featuring paneer (cottage cheese) cubes stir-fried with bell peppers, onions, and a spicy chilli sauce. The dish is known for its vibrant colors and bold flavors, combining the creaminess of paneer with the heat of chillies and the tanginess of soy sauce. It is typically served as a main course or appetizer, often accompanied by steamed rice or Indian breads like naan or roti.

dishes.name: Butter Masala Paneer
dishes.description: Butter Masala Paneer is a rich and creamy North Indian main course dish. It features paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a luscious tomato-based gravy, enriched with butter, cream, and a blend of aromatic spices. The dish is known for its mildly spicy, tangy, and savory flavor profile, making it a popular choice for daily meals and special occasions alike. It is typically served with naan, roti, or steamed rice.

dishes.name: Classic
dishes.description: A versatile term that can refer to many traditional dishes, a classic typically features time-honored ingredients and preparation methods. These dishes are enjoyed worldwide as main courses or comfort foods, celebrated for their timeless appeal and familiar tastes.

It is typically served with raita (yogurt side dish) or mirchi ka salan (spicy chili curry) for a complete dining experience.

dishes.name: Egg Biryani (Regular)
dishes.description: Egg Biryani is a flavorful and aromatic one-pot dish featuring hard-boiled eggs layered with fragrant basmati rice, spices, and herbs. The eggs are marinated in a blend of yogurt, turmeric, and chili powder, then cooked with saut√©ed onions, tomatoes, and a mix of whole spices like cardamom, cinnamon, and cloves. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, this dish is a popular main course enjoyed for its savory and spicy notes, often served with raita or mirchi ka salan.

dishes.name: Egg Biryani (Family Pack)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Egg Biryani (Family Pack) is a hearty and aromatic main course dish featuring tender eggs and fragrant basmati rice, layered with a blend of spices, herbs, and saut√©ed vegetables. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, this dish is slow-cooked to perfection, allowing the flavors to meld together. It offers a savory and slightly spicy flavor profile, making it a popular choice for family gatherings and festive occasions. Served hot, it is often accompanied by raita or salad to balance the rich flavors.

dishes.name: Chicken 65 Biryani (Regular)
dishes.description: Chicken 65 Biryani is a flavorful main course dish that combines tender, spicy fried chicken pieces with fragrant basmati rice. The chicken is marinated in a blend of spices, deep-fried to perfection, and then layered with partially cooked rice, saut√©ed onions, and aromatic spices. Originating from South India, this dish offers a delightful mix of spicy, savory flavors and is typically enjoyed as a hearty meal during festivals or special occasions.

dishes.name: Chicken 65 Biryani (Family Pack)
dishes.description: Chicken 65 Biryani (Family Pack) is a hearty main course dish that combines the fiery flavors of Chicken 65 with the aromatic spices of biryani. The core ingredients include marinated chicken pieces, basmati rice, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of spices like turmeric, red chili powder, and garam masala. The chicken is fried to a crispy texture and then layered with partially cooked rice, which is steamed to perfection. Originating from South India, this dish offers a spicy, savory, and slightly tangy flavor profile. It is typically enjoyed as a festive or special occasion meal, perfect for sharing with family and friends.

dishes.name: Bezawada Chicken Biryani (Regular)
dishes.description: Bezawada Chicken Biryani is a fragrant and flavorful one-pot dish from Vijayawada, India. The dish is known for its balanced blend of spices, including cardamom, cloves, and saffron, offering a savory and mildly spicy flavor profile. Typically enjoyed as a main course during lunches or dinners, it is often paired with raita or mirchi ka salan for a complete meal.

dishes.name: Bezawada Chicken Biryani (Family Pack)
dishes.description: Bezawada Chicken Biryani is a fragrant and flavorful layered rice dish originating from Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh. It features tender chicken pieces cooked with basmati rice, aromatic spices like cardamom, cloves, and saffron, and garnished with fried onions and mint leaves. This family-sized portion is perfect for sharing, offering a delightful blend of savory and spicy notes, best enjoyed with raita or mirchi ka salan.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken Biryani (Regular)

Originating from the United States, pepperoni is known for its spicy, savory taste and slightly smoky aroma. It is commonly enjoyed on pizzas, in sandwiches, or as a standalone snack.

Made primarily from cured pork and beef, it is seasoned with paprika and chili pepper, then dried and smoked to perfection. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is a staple in Italian-American cuisine, most famously used as a topping for pizzas. It is enjoyed for its bold, slightly spicy taste and can also be found in sandwiches, salads, and antipasto platters.

dishes.name: Chilli Chicken
dishes.description: Chilli Chicken is a popular Indo-Chinese dish featuring boneless chicken pieces stir-fried with bell peppers, onions, and a blend of spices. The chicken is marinated in soy sauce, vinegar, and chilli sauce, then fried until crispy and coated in a tangy, spicy, and slightly sweet sauce. This flavorful dish is typically enjoyed as a main course or a spicy appetizer, often served with fried rice or noodles.

dishes.name: Butter Masala Chicken
dishes.description: Butter Masala Chicken is a rich and creamy North Indian dish featuring tender chicken pieces cooked in a velvety tomato-based gravy. The main ingredients include chicken, butter, cream, tomatoes, onions, and a blend of aromatic spices. This dish is slow-cooked to perfection, allowing the flavors to meld together, resulting in a mildly spicy and savory flavor profile. It is typically served as a main course, accompanied by naan, roti, or steamed rice, making it a popular choice for both everyday meals and special occasions.

dishes.name: Chilli Paneer
dishes.description: Chilli Paneer is a popular Indo-Chinese dish featuring cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) stir-fried with bell peppers, onions, and a savory, spicy sauce. The paneer is typically marinated in a mixture of cornstarch and spices, then deep-fried or pan-fried to achieve a crispy texture. The dish is known for its bold, tangy, and slightly sweet flavor profile, balanced with a touch of heat from chili peppers. It is often served as a main course or appetizer, accompanied by fried rice or noodles, making it a favorite in Indian-Chinese cuisine.

dishes.name: Butter Masala Paneer
dishes.description: Butter Masala Paneer is a rich and creamy North Indian dish featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a velvety tomato-based gravy. The main ingredients include paneer, butter, tomatoes, cream, and a blend of aromatic spices. This dish is prepared by simmering the spices and tomatoes to create a thick, flavorful base, then adding paneer and cream for a luxurious finish. It is typically enjoyed as a main course with naan or rice, offering a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile.

dishes.name: Classic
dishes.description: A versatile term that can refer to a wide range of dishes, 'Classic' typically denotes a traditional or time-honored recipe that has stood the test of time. Core ingredients vary widely depending on the specific dish, but often include high-quality, foundational components like fresh vegetables, quality meats, or rich dairy. Preparation methods can range from baking and frying to grilling or simmering, depending on the dish. Originating from various culinary traditions worldwide, classics are often savory and comforting, enjoyed as main courses or sometimes as hearty accompaniments. They are commonly served in both casual and formal settings, celebrating the essence of familiar and beloved flavors.

dishes.name: Spicy Classic
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. The Spicy Classic is a vibrant main course dish that combines a medley of core ingredients such as tender chicken or beef, fresh vegetables, and a rich, aromatic sauce. The preparation involves stir-frying or grilling the meat and vegetables, then coating them in a spicy, tangy sauce made from chili peppers, garlic, and soy sauce. Originating from various Asian cuisines, this dish is known for its bold, fiery flavor profile that is both savory and spicy. It is typically enjoyed as a hearty meal, often served with steamed rice or noodles, making it a popular choice for both daily meals and special occasions.

dishes.name: Chicken Bacon Ranch
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Chicken Bacon Ranch is a hearty main course dish featuring tender chicken pieces, crispy bacon, and a creamy ranch dressing. The chicken and bacon are typically baked or grilled, then tossed in a rich ranch sauce, often served over a bed of lettuce or as a filling for wraps and sandwiches. This dish combines smoky, savory flavors with a tangy, creamy finish, making it a popular choice for casual meals and gatherings.

dishes.name: Meatball Parmesan
dishes.description: Meatball Parmesan is a hearty main course featuring tender, seasoned meatballs smothered in rich tomato sauce and melted mozzarella and Parmesan cheeses. The meatballs are typically baked or broiled to achieve a crispy exterior while keeping the inside juicy. Originating from Italian-American cuisine, this dish offers a savory and comforting flavor profile, often enjoyed as a satisfying family meal or at Italian restaurants.

dishes.name: Tandoori Wings
dishes.description: Tandoori Wings are a flavorful main course dish featuring chicken wings marinated in a blend of yogurt, spices like turmeric, cumin, and coriander, and then cooked in a traditional tandoor oven. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, these wings are known for their smoky, spicy, and tangy flavor profile. They are often served as an appetizer or snack, accompanied by mint chutney or raita, making them a popular choice for both casual and festive meals.

dishes.name: Chilli Paneer Calzone
dishes.description: A fusion delight, the Chilli Paneer Calzone is a stuffed pizza pocket filled with spiced paneer, bell peppers, onions, and a tangy chilli sauce. The dough is rolled, stuffed, and baked to a golden crisp, offering a savory and slightly spicy flavor profile. This dish combines the best of Indian and Italian cuisines, making it a popular choice for a hearty main course or a satisfying snack.

dishes.name: Butter Paneer Calzone
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Butter Paneer Calzone is a delightful fusion of Italian and Indian cuisines, featuring a stuffed pizza pocket filled with paneer (Indian cottage cheese), butter, and a blend of aromatic spices. The dough is rolled out, filled with the paneer mixture, folded into a half-moon shape, and then baked to golden perfection. This savory and cheesy treat is enjoyed as a main course or a hearty snack, offering a rich and flavorful experience.

dishes.name: Butter Chicken Calzone
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A Butter Chicken Calzone is a fusion dish that combines the rich flavors of Indian butter chicken with the Italian-style calzone. This main course features tender chicken marinated in a spiced tomato and butter sauce, encased in a golden, baked pizza dough. The calzone is typically stuffed with the creamy butter chicken, onions, and mozzarella cheese, offering a delightful blend of savory and slightly spicy flavors. It is enjoyed as a hearty meal, often served with a side of garlic sauce or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: Cheesy Calzone
dishes.description: A Cheesy Calzone is a folded Italian pizza pocket, baked to golden perfection. It features a doughy crust stuffed with melted mozzarella, ricotta, and a blend of savory ingredients like pepperoni, mushrooms, and spinach. This hearty main course is enjoyed as a satisfying meal, often accompanied by marinara sauce for dipping. Originating from Naples, it offers a rich, cheesy flavor profile that is both comforting and indulgent.

dishes.name: Meat Calzone
dishes.description: A Meat Calzone is a hearty Italian main course featuring a folded pizza dough stuffed with a savory filling of seasoned ground meat, typically beef or pork, along with cheese, tomatoes, and herbs. The dough is sealed to encase the filling and then baked until golden and crispy. dishes.name: Coffee

dishes.name: EGG BURGER
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. An Egg Burger is a popular snack or light meal featuring a fried or scrambled egg nestled within a soft bun, often accompanied by lettuce, tomato, and condiments like mayonnaise or mustard. Originating from various cultures, it's a quick and satisfying option enjoyed for breakfast, lunch, or a quick bite on the go. The flavor profile is savory and customizable, with the egg providing a rich, protein-packed center.

dishes.name: CHEESE BURGER
dishes.description: A classic American fast-food staple, the Cheese Burger features a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, served in a soft bun. Often accompanied by lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments like ketchup and mustard, it's typically grilled or fried to perfection. Enjoyed as a quick meal or snack, this savory and satisfying dish is a favorite worldwide.

dishes.name: BIG BEN BURGER
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. The Big Ben Burger is a hearty main course featuring a beef patty topped with a fried egg, bacon, and melted cheddar cheese, all nestled within a toasted brioche bun. This indulgent burger is typically grilled to perfection, offering a savory and rich flavor profile. Originating from modern Western cuisine, it's often enjoyed as a substantial meal or a satisfying snack, perfect for a quick lunch or a casual dinner.

dishes.name: DOUBLE CHEESE
dishes.description: Double Cheese is a rich and indulgent snack or side dish featuring a generous layering of melted cheese. The core ingredients typically include bread, cheese, and various toppings such as vegetables, meats, or herbs. It is often prepared by grilling or toasting the bread and layering it with melted cheese, sometimes with additional ingredients for extra flavor. Originating from various culinary traditions, Double Cheese is enjoyed for its savory and creamy taste, making it a popular choice for quick meals or appetizers.

dishes.name: SPICY BEAN BURGER
dishes.description: A plant-based patty made from mashed beans, spices, and breadcrumbs, the Spicy Bean Burger is a flavorful vegetarian main course. Typically pan-fried or baked, it's often served on a bun with fresh toppings like lettuce, tomato, and a spicy sauce. Originating from various global cuisines, this burger offers a savory and spicy flavor profile, making it a popular choice for a hearty meal or a quick snack.

dishes.name: VEGGIE BURGER
dishes.description: A plant-based twist on the classic burger, the Veggie Burger features a patty made from a blend of vegetables, grains, and legumes, often seasoned with herbs and spices. The patty is typically grilled or pan-fried and served on a toasted bun, accompanied by fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and a variety of condiments like ketchup, mustard, or vegan mayo. Originating as a vegetarian and vegan alternative, this dish is enjoyed as a main course in various cuisines, offering a savory and hearty flavor profile. It's a popular choice for those seeking a meat-free option, often served in casual dining settings or as a quick, satisfying meal.

dishes.name: MARGARITA
dishes.description: Margarita is a classic cocktail known for its refreshing and tangy flavor. The core ingredients include tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, often served with a salted rim. This beverage is typically shaken and served over ice, making it a popular choice for celebrations and social gatherings. Originating from Mexico, the Margarita is enjoyed worldwide as a festive drink.

dishes.name: TUNA & ONION
dishes.description: Tuna & Onion is a simple yet flavorful dish featuring fresh tuna steaks or fillets paired with caramelized onions. The tuna is typically pan-seared to perfection, while the onions are cooked until golden and sweet. This dish is enjoyed as a main course, often served with a side of vegetables or a fresh salad. Its savory and slightly sweet profile makes it a popular choice in various cuisines, particularly in Mediterranean and Western cooking.

dishes.name: PEPPERONI
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a type of salami, classified as a cured sausage. It is made from a blend of cured pork and beef mixed with paprika or other chili pepper for its characteristic red color and spicy flavor. Typically sliced thin and used as a topping for pizzas, it can also be eaten as a snack or added to sandwiches. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is now a staple in many cuisines worldwide, known for its smoky, spicy, and slightly tangy taste.

dishes.name: 4 CHEESES
dishes.description: 4 Cheeses is a rich and indulgent dish that showcases a blend of four distinct cheeses. Typically, it features a combination of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gorgonzola, creating a savory and creamy flavor profile. This dish is often prepared by layering or melting the cheeses, making it a popular choice for pasta, pizza, or a decadent baked dish. Originating from Italian cuisine, it is enjoyed as a main course or a hearty accompaniment to meals.

dishes.name: CALZONE
dishes.description: A Calzone is an Italian turnover or folded pizza, typically stuffed with cheese, meats, and vegetables. It is baked until golden and crispy, with a savory and hearty flavor profile. Originating from Italy, it is often enjoyed as a main course or a substantial snack, perfect for a quick meal or a casual gathering.

dishes.name: HAWAIIAN
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. The Hawaiian dish typically refers to a main course featuring a blend of tropical flavors and ingredients. Core components often include fresh pineapple, ham, and sometimes chicken or shrimp, all baked or grilled together. Originating from the Hawaiian Islands, this dish is known for its sweet and savory flavor profile, making it a popular choice for both daily meals and festive occasions. It is often served as a hearty main dish, showcasing the vibrant culinary traditions of Hawaii.

dishes.name: ICE CREAM CORNET
dishes.description: A delightful frozen treat, the Ice Cream Cornet features creamy ice cream served in a crisp, cone-shaped pastry. The core ingredients include rich ice cream and a light, crunchy cornettier shell. Originating from Europe, this dessert is enjoyed worldwide as a sweet snack or dessert, offering a delightful contrast of textures and a sweet, creamy flavor profile.

dishes.name: WAFFLE & ICE CREAM
dishes.description: Waffle & Ice Cream is a classic dessert featuring crispy, golden waffles topped with creamy, cold ice cream. The waffles are typically made from a batter of flour, eggs, milk, and baking powder, then cooked in a special waffle iron to create a grid pattern. This sweet treat is often enjoyed as a dessert or snack, with popular variations including chocolate, vanilla, or fruit-flavored ice cream, and additional toppings like syrup, whipped cream, or fresh berries.

dishes.name: APPLE PIE
dishes.description: Apple pie is a classic dessert featuring a flaky pastry crust filled with spiced apples, often sweetened with sugar and cinnamon. The apples are typically stewed or baked until tender, creating a warm, comforting filling. Originating in Europe, this beloved treat is enjoyed worldwide, often served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream.

dishes.name: DONUT
dishes.description: A donut is a popular sweet snack or dessert made primarily from deep-fried dough. The dough is typically enriched with eggs, sugar, and butter, then shaped into rings or filled with sweet or savory fillings. Originating in Europe, donuts are now enjoyed worldwide, often dusted with sugar, glazed, or topped with sprinkles. They are commonly served as a breakfast item or a sweet treat, perfect with a cup of coffee or tea.

dishes.name: BOTTLED WATER
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Bottled water is a beverage that consists of purified water packaged in plastic or glass bottles. It is typically sourced from natural springs or municipal water supplies and undergoes filtration and treatment processes. dishes.name: SOFT DRINK CAN

Commonly enjoyed as a beverage accompaniment to meals or as a standalone drink, soft drink cans are widely available in convenience stores, supermarkets, and vending machines worldwide.

dishes.name: ORANGE JUICE

dishes.name: TEA or COFFEE
dishes.description: Tea is a beloved beverage made from steeping the processed leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant in hot water. Originating in China, tea is enjoyed worldwide, often as a daily drink, an accompaniment to meals, or a comforting ritual. Its flavor profile ranges from earthy and robust to delicate and floral, depending on the type and brewing process.

dishes.name: Pepperoni
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a type of salami, classified as a cured sausage. It is typically made from a blend of beef and pork, seasoned with paprika or other chili pepper for its characteristic red color and spicy flavor. Pepperoni is often sliced thinly and used as a topping for pizzas, where it is baked until slightly crispy. It is a popular choice in American and Italian cuisine, enjoyed for its savory and spicy taste.

dishes.name: Ice Cream Cornet

dishes.name: Margarita

dishes.description: A soft drink can is a beverage container typically made of aluminum or steel, holding a carbonated drink. The can is sealed and pressurized to maintain the drink's fizziness. dishes.name: Hawaiian

dishes.name: Donut

dishes.name: Bottled Water
dishes.description: Bottled water is a beverage that consists of water packaged in plastic or glass bottles.
