Core ingredients include ripe avocados, canned tuna, red onion, cherry tomatoes, and a tangy dressing made from lemon juice, olive oil, and herbs. This salad is typically enjoyed as a light main course or a hearty appetizer, offering a delightful blend of flavors that are both savory and slightly tangy. It's a versatile dish that can be served chilled, making it perfect for warm weather or as a quick, healthy meal.

dishes.name: Poridge With Cherries
dishes.description: A comforting and sweet breakfast or dessert dish, Porridge with Cherries features a creamy base of cooked grains, typically oats or rice, infused with the natural sweetness of cherries. The cherries, often pitted and fresh or preserved, add a delightful tartness and vibrant color to the dish. This simple yet satisfying dish is commonly enjoyed warm, topped with a drizzle of honey or a sprinkle of cinnamon for added flavor. It's a popular choice for a cozy morning meal or a light evening treat.

dishes.name: Poached Egg Sandwiches
dishes.description: Poached Egg Sandwiches are a delightful breakfast or lunch option featuring eggs poached to perfection, nestled between slices of toasted bread. The core ingredients include fresh eggs, bread, butter, and often accompanied by condiments like mayonnaise or hollandaise sauce. This dish is prepared by gently poaching eggs in simmering water and layering them on buttered toast, creating a harmonious blend of textures and flavors. Originating from various culinary traditions, it is enjoyed for its savory and creamy profile, making it a popular choice for a quick yet satisfying meal.

dishes.name: Organic Ham Salad
dishes.description: Savor the rich flavors of our Organic Ham Salad, lovingly crafted from the finest selection of organic ham and embellished with a medley of fresh, crisp vegetables. Each bite offers a perfect harmony of taste and texture, making this a must-try for any discerning palate.

dishes.name: French Toast
dishes.description: Savor our delightful French Toast, a sublime marriage of sweet honey and tart berries enveloped in golden, eggy bread.

dishes.name: Waffles
dishes.description: Savor our delightful Waffles, available in a variety of flavors and topped with an assortment of sweet additions.

dishes.name: Egg Burger
dishes.description: Indulge in our savory Egg Burger, a delightful fusion of a juicy beef patty and a perfectly cooked sunny-side-up egg, nestled in a toasted brioche bun. Enhanced with crisp lettuce, ripe tomato, and our signature burger sauce, this irresistible burger promises a memorable culinary experience.

dishes.name: Cheese Burger
dishes.description: A classic American main course, the Cheese Burger is a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, served in a soft bun. It often includes lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments like ketchup and mustard. Grilled to perfection, it offers a savory and indulgent flavor profile, perfect for a quick meal or a casual gathering.

dishes.name: Big Ben Burger
dishes.description: The Big Ben Burger is a hearty main course featuring a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and a tangy BBQ sauce. Grilled to perfection and served on a toasted brioche bun, this burger is a flavorful indulgence. Originating from modern American cuisine, it's a popular choice for casual dining and fast-food menus, offering a savory and satisfying meal experience.

dishes.name: Double Cheese
dishes.description: Double Cheese is a rich and indulgent dish featuring a generous layering of two types of cheese, typically mozzarella and cheddar, within a crispy or soft base. Commonly found in pizzas, burgers, or grilled sandwiches, this dish is prepared by melting the cheeses together to create a gooey, flavorful filling. Originating from various cuisines, it is enjoyed for its savory and creamy flavor profile, often as a main course or a hearty snack. The dish is popular in fast-food chains and casual dining settings, offering a satisfying and cheesy experience.

dishes.name: Spicy Bean Burger
dishes.description: A plant-based patty made from mashed beans, spices, and breadcrumbs, shaped into a burger and pan-fried until crispy. Originating as a vegetarian alternative, it's often served with lettuce, tomato, and a spicy sauce in a bun. This dish is enjoyed as a main course or a hearty snack, offering a savory and spicy flavor profile.

dishes.name: Veggie Burger
dishes.description: A Veggie Burger is a plant-based twist on the classic burger, featuring a patty made from ingredients like beans, lentils, vegetables, and grains. The patty is often seasoned with herbs and spices, then grilled or pan-fried to perfection. Served on a soft bun with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and condiments like ketchup or mayo, it's a hearty and flavorful main course enjoyed by vegetarians and vegans alike. This dish is popular in various cuisines and is often served as a quick, satisfying meal or a healthier alternative to traditional beef burgers.

dishes.name: Margarita
dishes.description: A classic margarita is a vibrant cocktail known for its refreshing blend of tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, typically served over ice. This beverage is often rimmed with salt and garnished with a lime wedge, enhancing its tangy and slightly sweet flavor profile. Originating from Mexico, it is a popular choice for social gatherings and celebrations, enjoyed as an aperitif or a refreshing drink throughout the day.

dishes.name: Tuna & Onion
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Tuna & Onion is a simple yet flavorful dish featuring fresh tuna steaks or fillets cooked with caramelized onions. The tuna is typically pan-seared or grilled to perfection, while the onions are saut√©ed until golden and sweet. This dish is popular in various cuisines, particularly in Mediterranean and Western cooking, and is known for its savory and slightly sweet flavor profile. It is often enjoyed as a main course, accompanied by a side of vegetables or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: Pepperoni
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a type of salami, classified as a cured sausage, commonly used as a pizza topping. Made from cured pork and beef mixed with paprika or other chili pepper, it offers a spicy, smoky flavor. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is typically thinly sliced and enjoyed on pizzas, sandwiches, or as a snack. Its vibrant red color and slightly oily texture make it a popular choice for adding a kick to various dishes.

dishes.name: 4 Cheeses
dishes.description: 4 Cheeses is a rich and indulgent dish featuring a blend of four distinct cheeses, often including cheddar, mozzarella, parmesan, and gorgonzola. These cheeses are typically melted together, either in a baked dish like a lasagna or a creamy sauce, creating a gooey and flavorful experience. Originating from various culinary traditions, this dish is enjoyed for its savory and tangy notes, making it a popular choice for comfort food lovers and cheese enthusiasts alike.

dishes.name: Calzone
dishes.description: A Calzone is an Italian turnover-shaped pizza that is folded to enclose its fillings. It is typically made with a thick, doughy crust and stuffed with ingredients like mozzarella, ricotta, prosciutto, and vegetables. The calzone is baked until golden and crispy, resulting in a savory and hearty dish. It is often enjoyed as a main course, either plain or with a side of marinara sauce for dipping.

dishes.name: Hawaiian
dishes.description: Hawaiian cuisine is a vibrant blend of flavors and textures, reflecting the diverse cultural influences of the islands. Core ingredients often include fresh fish like mahi-mahi and ahi, tropical fruits such as pineapple and mango, and staples like rice and taro. Dishes are typically prepared through grilling, steaming, or baking, with a focus on bold, savory, and slightly sweet flavors. Whether it's a main course like loco moco or a dessert like haupia, Hawaiian food is enjoyed in both casual and festive settings, embodying the spirit of aloha.

dishes.name: Ice Cream Cornet
dishes.description: A delightful dessert featuring a crisp, cone-shaped pastry filled with creamy ice cream. The cornet is typically made from a buttery, flaky dough that is baked to a golden perfection, then filled with a variety of ice cream flavors such as vanilla, chocolate, or fruit-based options. This treat is enjoyed as a sweet snack or dessert, often found in bakeries and ice cream shops, offering a delightful contrast of textures and temperatures.

dishes.name: Waffle & Ice Cream
dishes.description: A classic dessert featuring crispy, golden waffles topped with a scoop of creamy ice cream. The waffles are typically made from a batter of flour, eggs, and milk, baked until fluffy and golden. This sweet treat is often drizzled with syrup, chocolate sauce, or sprinkled with powdered sugar, creating a delightful contrast of warm and cold textures. It's a popular choice for indulgent desserts, often enjoyed at diners, ice cream parlors, and family gatherings.

dishes.name: Apple Pie
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Apple Pie is a classic dessert featuring a flaky pastry crust filled with spiced apples, often cinnamon and sugar, and sometimes topped with a lattice or crumble. Originating from Europe, it is baked to golden perfection, offering a warm, sweet, and comforting flavor profile. This iconic treat is enjoyed year-round, especially during holidays, and is often served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream.

dishes.name: Donut
dishes.description: A donut is a popular sweet snack or dessert made from deep-fried dough. The core ingredients include flour, sugar, eggs, and yeast or baking powder for leavening. Donuts are typically fried until golden brown and can be glazed, filled, or topped with various sweet coatings. Originating from Dutch cuisine, they are enjoyed worldwide as a breakfast item or indulgent treat.

dishes.name: Bottled Water
dishes.description: Bottled water is a beverage consisting of water that has been packaged in plastic or glass bottles. It is typically sourced from springs, artesian wells, or municipal water supplies and undergoes filtration and purification processes. This refreshing and essential drink is enjoyed worldwide as a daily staple, often served chilled and accompanied by meals or consumed on its own to stay hydrated.

dishes.name: Soft Drink Can
dishes.description: A Soft Drink Can is a portable, sealed container typically made of aluminum or plastic, holding a carbonated beverage. The drink inside is usually flavored with fruits, soda, or other sweetening agents, and is often enjoyed chilled. This beverage is a popular choice for casual consumption, picnics, and quick refreshment on the go.

dishes.name: Orange Juice
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Orange Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of oranges, often blended with water and sweetened to taste. It can be enjoyed freshly squeezed, pasteurized, or in various blends, offering a sweet and tangy flavor profile. Popular worldwide, it is commonly served as a breakfast drink or a refreshing beverage throughout the day.

dishes.name: Tea or Coffee
dishes.description: Tea or Coffee are popular beverages enjoyed worldwide. Tea is typically brewed from the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant, offering a range of flavors from earthy to floral, and is often served hot or iced. Coffee, made from roasted coffee beans, delivers a robust, bitter, or sweet taste depending on the brewing method and additions like milk or sugar. Both are commonly consumed as daily staples, accompaniments to meals, or social rituals, reflecting diverse cultural practices and preferences.

dishes.name: Crispy Calamari
dishes.description: Crispy Calamari is a popular seafood appetizer featuring tender squid rings or tentacles coated in a light, crispy batter and deep-fried to golden perfection. Originating from Mediterranean cuisine, it is often seasoned with salt, pepper, and sometimes garlic or paprika for added flavor. Served hot with a side of lemon wedges and tangy dipping sauces like marinara or aioli, this dish is a favorite in coastal regions and seafood restaurants worldwide.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.description: Caprese Salad is a classic Italian appetizer featuring fresh mozzarella cheese, ripe tomatoes, and fragrant basil leaves. Drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and balsamic glaze, this vibrant dish is known for its refreshing and savory flavors. Typically served as a starter or light meal, it showcases the simplicity and elegance of Mediterranean cuisine.

dishes.name: Buffalo Chicken Dip
dishes.description: Buffalo Chicken Dip is a creamy, spicy appetizer featuring shredded chicken coated in buffalo sauce, mixed with cream cheese, ranch or blue cheese dressing, and melted cheeses. Baked until bubbly and golden, it's served warm with tortilla chips, celery, or crackers. Originating in the United States, this crowd-pleasing dip is a staple at parties and game-day gatherings, offering a tangy, spicy, and indulgent flavor profile.

dishes.name: Cobb Salad
dishes.description: Cobb Salad is a hearty main course salad that originated in the United States. It features a base of mixed greens topped with diced chicken breast, hard-boiled eggs, avocado, tomatoes, crispy bacon, blue cheese, and sometimes roasted turkey. The ingredients are artfully arranged and typically dressed with a creamy ranch or red wine vinaigrette. This dish is enjoyed for its rich, savory flavors and is often served as a substantial lunch or dinner option.

dishes.name: Caesar Salad
dishes.description: Caesar Salad is a classic American dish featuring crisp romaine lettuce, creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Traditionally prepared by tossing the ingredients together, it's often garnished with anchovies for a savory, umami-rich flavor. This iconic salad is typically served as a starter or side dish, enjoyed for its tangy, creamy, and slightly savory profile.

dishes.name: Mediterranean Salad
dishes.description: A vibrant and refreshing salad featuring fresh cucumbers, ripe tomatoes, crisp bell peppers, red onions, and Kalamata olives, all tossed with feta cheese and a tangy olive oil and lemon dressing. This dish is a staple in Mediterranean cuisine, known for its bright, savory flavors and healthy ingredients. It is typically served as a side dish or a light main course, perfect for warm weather or as a refreshing accompaniment to grilled meats.

dishes.name: Grilled Salmon
dishes.description: Grilled Salmon is a main course dish featuring fresh salmon fillets seasoned with herbs, spices, and a touch of citrus, then cooked over an open flame or grill. Originating from various coastal regions, this dish highlights the natural flavors of the fish with a smoky char. It is savory and slightly aromatic, often enjoyed as a healthy, protein-rich meal accompanied by vegetables or a light salad.

dishes.name: Chicken Alfredo
dishes.description: Chicken Alfredo is a rich and creamy Italian-American pasta dish featuring tender chicken pieces and fettuccine noodles coated in a velvety Alfredo sauce made from butter, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese. The dish is typically prepared by saut√©ing chicken, cooking pasta, and combining them with the sauce, often garnished with parsley. It is a beloved comfort food, commonly enjoyed as a main course in restaurants and homes, known for its indulgent and savory flavor profile.

dishes.name: Baked Eggplant Parmesan
dishes.description: A comforting Italian-American main course featuring tender baked eggplant layered with tangy tomato sauce, melted mozzarella, and rich Parmesan cheese. The eggplant is typically sliced, breaded, and baked until golden before being assembled into a hearty, cheesy casserole. This dish is often served as a vegetarian alternative to traditional lasagna, enjoyed as a satisfying daily meal or at gatherings.

dishes.name: Soft Drinks
dishes.description: Soft drinks are carbonated, non-alcoholic beverages known for their sweet, fizzy nature. Typically made with water, sweeteners, and flavorings, they come in a variety of flavors such as cola, lemon-lime, and fruit-based options. Often enjoyed as a refreshing accompaniment to meals or as a standalone drink, soft drinks are popular worldwide and are commonly served chilled.

dishes.name: Iced Tea
dishes.description: Iced tea is a refreshing beverage made by brewing tea leaves and then cooling the resulting liquid over ice. It typically consists of black or green tea, sugar, and various flavorings such as lemon, mint, or fruit essences. Originating in the American South, it is enjoyed chilled and is a popular drink during warm weather, often served as a daily beverage or accompaniment to meals.

dishes.name: Lemonade
dishes.description: Lemonade is a refreshing beverage made primarily from lemons, water, and sugar. It is typically prepared by mixing freshly squeezed lemon juice with sweetened water, often served chilled over ice. Originating from the Middle East, lemonade is enjoyed worldwide as a popular drink to quench thirst, especially during hot weather. Its tangy and sweet flavor profile makes it a favorite for both children and adults alike.

dishes.name: MESA BURGEUSA BRUNCH BURGER
dishes.description: Savor the MESA BRUNCH BURGER, a hefty ¬Ω pound patty grilled to perfection, smothered in housemade bacon jam, and adorned with smoked gouda. Topped with a fried over hard egg and nestled between two buttery brioche buns, this masterpiece is served with a side of crispy house potatoes to complement your brunch experience.

dishes.name: SOUTHERN FRIED BENEDICT
dishes.description: Fried chicken, buttermilk biscuits, egg omelet, rosemary hollandaise, smashed potatoes

dishes.name: CHORIZO FRITATA
dishes.description: fluffy egg frittata, chorizo, smoked gouda, asparagus, peppers, squash, lemon dressed greens

dishes.name: HUEVOS RANCHEROS FRITATA
dishes.description: charred salsa, white onion, cilantro, cheddar cheese, jalapenos, house potatoes, lemon dressed greens

dishes.name: STEAK AND EGGS
dishes.description: Marinated bavette, smashed crispy fingerlings, two egg omelet, chimichurri, criolla, brioche toast

dishes.name: Cast Iron Baked Biscuits & Gravy
dishes.description: Creamy chorizo gravy, buttermilk biscuits, Spanish paprika, two egg omelet

dishes.name: SMASHED SKILLET
dishes.description: Smashed fingerling potatoes, chorizo, three cheese fundido, two eggs scrambled, cilantro, brioche toast

dishes.name: PORK BELLY HASH
dishes.description: Smashed fingerling potatoes, crispy pork belly, poblano peppers, red peppers, red onion, cilantro, rosemary hollandaise, poached eggs

dishes.name: CHICKEN & WAFFLES
dishes.description: Crispy fried chicken, buttermilk waffles, maple syrup, side of chorizo gravy

dishes.name: BRUNCH PIZZA
dishes.description: house red sauce, fingerling potatoes, kale, smokey fennel sausage, mozzarella, chili oil, egg

dishes.name: PATATA AL FORNO BREAKFAST PIZZA
dishes.description: Fingerling potatoes, white sauce, mozzarella, chorizo sausage, egg, greens

dishes.name: FRENCH TOAST de COCO
dishes.description: Shredded coconut, caramelized bananas, cream, thick cut brioche eggy bread

dishes.name: CINNAMON ROLLS FOR TWO
dishes.description: fresh baked cinnamon rolls, house made dulce de leche. Please allow for 30 minutes as we roll our cinnamon rolls only upon order

dishes.name: Cheese Pie (10 Small)
dishes.description: A delightful snack or appetizer, these small cheese pies feature a flaky, buttery pastry crust filled with a rich, creamy cheese mixture. Originating from various culinary traditions, they are typically baked to golden perfection, offering a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile. These bite-sized treats are perfect for parties, gatherings, or a quick snack, providing a satisfying crunch with every bite.

dishes.name: Cheese Pie (12 Med)
dishes.description: A delightful snack or appetizer, Cheese Pie (12 Med) features a flaky, buttery crust filled with a rich and creamy cheese mixture. The pies are typically baked to golden perfection, offering a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile. Originating from various cultures, these individual-sized pies are perfect for enjoying as a quick bite or a part of a larger meal.

dishes.name: Cheese Pie (16 Large)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A Cheese Pie is a savory pastry filled with a rich, creamy cheese mixture, often enhanced with herbs and spices. The dough is typically rolled out, filled, and baked to golden perfection, resulting in a flaky, crispy exterior and a gooey, melted cheese center. This dish is enjoyed as a main course or snack, popular in various cultures, including Greek tiropita and Italian cheese-filled pastries. It's a comforting, indulgent treat that pairs well with a side salad or a cup of coffee.

dishes.name: Pepperoni (10 Small)
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a type of salami, characterized by its vibrant red color and spicy flavor. Made primarily from cured pork and beef, it is seasoned with paprika or other chili pepper for its distinctive heat. Thinly sliced and often used as a topping for pizzas, it can also be enjoyed as a snack or in sandwiches. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is a staple in American cuisine, known for its savory and slightly smoky taste.

dishes.name: Pepperoni (12 Med)
dishes.description: Pepperoni (12 Med) is a popular snack or appetizer featuring 12 medium-sized slices of cured, spiced sausage. Made primarily from beef and pork, it is seasoned with paprika, chili, and other spices, then dried and smoked to develop a rich, slightly spicy flavor. Often enjoyed on its own or as a topping for pizzas and sandwiches, pepperoni is a staple in American and Italian-American cuisine. Its savory, smoky, and mildly spicy profile makes it a versatile and beloved choice for various dishes.

dishes.name: Pepperoni (16 Large)
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a classic Italian-American cured sausage made primarily from a blend of pork and beef, seasoned with paprika, chili, and other spices. It is typically sliced and used as a topping for pizzas, where it is baked until slightly crispy. The flavor profile is bold and savory with a hint of spice, making it a popular choice for enhancing the taste of various dishes. Enjoyed as a main topping on pizzas or as a snack on its own, pepperoni is a staple in many households and pizzerias.

dishes.name: Hawaiian (10 Small)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. The Hawaiian (10 Small) is a popular pizza variety topped with ham, pineapple, and often includes additional ingredients like cheese, tomatoes, and onions. This dish is typically baked to perfection, offering a sweet and savory flavor profile that is both tangy and slightly smoky. Originating from the United States, it is enjoyed as a main course or a hearty snack, often paired with a side of garlic bread or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: Hawaiian (12 Med)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Hawaiian (12 Med) refers to a dozen medium-sized Hawaiian pizza slices, featuring a base of tomato sauce and cheese topped with ham, pineapple, and sometimes bell peppers. This dish is a popular main course or snack, originating from Canadian cuisine but widely enjoyed globally. The combination of sweet and savory flavors makes it a crowd-pleasing choice, often served in casual dining settings or as a quick meal.

dishes.name: Hawaiian (16 Large)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. The Hawaiian (16 Large) is a vibrant and refreshing fruit salad featuring a medley of tropical fruits, primarily pineapple, strawberries, and sometimes other fruits like kiwi or grapes. The fruits are typically macerated in a light syrup or juice, enhancing their natural sweetness. This dish is a popular dessert or snack, often enjoyed at luaus, picnics, or as a refreshing treat on warm days. It showcases the sweet and tangy flavors characteristic of Hawaiian cuisine.

dishes.name: Crispy Calamari
dishes.description: Indulge in our Crispy Calamari, featuring lightly battered and perfectly fried squid rings accompanied by a tangy marinara sauce for dipping. An exquisite appetizer to awaken your taste buds.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.description: Savor the freshness of our Caprese Salad, a classic Italian dish featuring ripe tomatoes, creamy mozzarella, and fragrant basil leaves, all lightly dressed in a tangy balsamic reduction.

dishes.name: Buffalo Chicken Dip
dishes.description: Savor the bold and tangy flavors of our Buffalo Chicken Dip, a rich and creamy blend of shredded chicken, zesty buffalo sauce, and melted cheeses. Perfect for sharing or indulging alone, this appetizer is a guaranteed crowd-pleaser.

dishes.name: Cobb Salad
dishes.description: Savor our classic Cobb Salad, a delightful medley of fresh greens, juicy chicken, crispy bacon, hard-boiled eggs, avocado, and crumbled blue cheese, all tossed in a tangy vinaigrette.

dishes.name: Caesar Salad
dishes.description: A classic Caesar Salad is a main course salad featuring crisp romaine lettuce, creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Originating in Mexico, this dish is typically tossed with a garlic-infused dressing and often includes grilled chicken for added protein. It is enjoyed for its savory, tangy flavors and is a popular choice for lunches or light dinners.

dishes.name: Mediterranean Salad
dishes.description: A refreshing and vibrant Mediterranean Salad is a light main course or side dish featuring core ingredients like crisp cucumbers, ripe tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese. Tossed with fresh parsley and a tangy dressing of olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano, this salad is a celebration of Mediterranean flavors. Originating from the coastal regions around the Mediterranean Sea, it is enjoyed for its savory, tangy, and slightly briny taste, making it a perfect accompaniment to grilled meats or a standalone meal.

dishes.name: Grilled Salmon
dishes.description: Grilled Salmon is a main course dish featuring fresh salmon fillets seasoned and cooked over an open flame or grill. The core ingredients include salmon, olive oil, lemon, garlic, and herbs such as dill or rosemary. This dish originates from various coastal regions and is enjoyed for its savory, slightly smoky flavor profile. Typically served with vegetables or a grain like quinoa, it's a popular choice for both daily meals and special occasions.

dishes.name: Chicken Alfredo
dishes.description: Chicken Alfredo is a creamy, indulgent pasta dish featuring tender chicken pieces and fettuccine noodles smothered in a rich, velvety Alfredo sauce. The sauce, made from butter, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese, coats the pasta and chicken, creating a luxurious and comforting meal. Originating from Italian-American cuisine, this dish is a popular main course, often served in restaurants and enjoyed as a hearty, satisfying dinner.

dishes.name: Baked Eggplant Parmesan
dishes.description: Baked Eggplant Parmesan is a hearty main course featuring layers of breaded and baked eggplant, rich tomato sauce, and melted Parmesan cheese. Originating from Italian-American cuisine, this dish offers a savory and comforting flavor profile. It is typically enjoyed as a satisfying dinner option, often accompanied by a side of pasta or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: Soft Drinks
dishes.description: Soft drinks are carbonated, non-alcoholic beverages typically sweetened and flavored with various fruit extracts, herbs, or other ingredients. They are usually served chilled and come in a wide range of flavors, from cola and citrus to fruit-based varieties. These refreshing drinks are commonly enjoyed as a standalone beverage or paired with meals, making them a popular choice for casual dining and social gatherings.

dishes.name: Iced Tea
dishes.description: Iced tea is a refreshing beverage made by brewing tea leaves and then chilling the resulting liquid over ice. Core ingredients include black or green tea leaves, water, and sweeteners like sugar or honey, often enhanced with lemon, mint, or fruit flavors. Originating from various cultures, it is enjoyed worldwide as a popular summer drink or daily refreshment. The flavor profile ranges from sweet and tangy to purely refreshing, depending on the added ingredients. It is typically served over ice in a glass, making it a perfect accompaniment to meals or a standalone drink.

dishes.name: Lemonade
dishes.description: Lemonade is a refreshing beverage made primarily from lemons, water, and sugar. It is typically prepared by mixing freshly squeezed lemon juice with sweetened water, often served chilled. Originating from the Middle East, this tangy and sweet drink is enjoyed worldwide as a popular summer refreshment or a daily thirst quencher.

dishes.name: Cheese Pie (12 Med)
dishes.description: A delightful snack or appetizer, Cheese Pie (12 Med) features a flaky, buttery crust filled with a rich and creamy cheese mixture. dishes.name: Cheese Pie (16 Large)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A Cheese Pie is a savory pastry filled with a rich, creamy cheese mixture, often enhanced with herbs and spices. The dough is typically rolled out, filled, and baked to golden perfection, resulting in a flaky, crispy exterior and a gooey, melted cheese center. This dish is enjoyed as a main course or snack, popular in various cultures, including Greek tiropita and Italian cheese-filled pastries. It's a comforting, indulgent treat that pairs well with a side salad or a cup of coffee.

dishes.name: Pepperoni (10 Small)
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a type of salami, characterized by its vibrant red color and spicy flavor. Made primarily from cured pork and beef, it is seasoned with paprika or other chili pepper for its distinctive heat. Thinly sliced and often used as a topping for pizzas, it can also be enjoyed as a snack or in sandwiches. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is a staple in American cuisine, known for its savory and slightly smoky taste.

dishes.name: Pepperoni (12 Med)
dishes.description: Pepperoni (12 Med) is a popular snack or appetizer featuring 12 medium-sized slices of cured, spiced sausage. Made primarily from beef and pork, it is seasoned with paprika, chili, and other spices, then dried and smoked to develop a rich, slightly spicy flavor. Often enjoyed on its own or as a topping for pizzas and sandwiches, pepperoni is a staple in American and Italian-American cuisine. Its savory, smoky, and mildly spicy profile makes it a versatile and beloved choice for various dishes.

dishes.name: Pepperoni (16 Large)
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a classic Italian-American cured sausage made primarily from a blend of pork and beef, seasoned with paprika, chili, and other spices. It is typically sliced and used as a topping for pizzas, where it is baked until slightly crispy. The flavor profile is bold and savory with a hint of spice, making it a popular choice for enhancing the taste of various dishes. Enjoyed as a main topping on pizzas or as a snack on its own, pepperoni is a staple in many households and pizzerias.

Originating from the United States, it is enjoyed as a main course or a hearty snack, often paired with a side of garlic bread or a fresh salad.

dishes.name: Hawaiian (12 Med)

The combination of sweet and savory flavors makes it a crowd-pleasing choice, often served in casual dining settings or as a quick meal.

dishes.name: Hawaiian (16 Large)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. The fruits are typically macerated in a light syrup or juice, enhancing their natural sweetness. This dish is a popular dessert or snack, often enjoyed at luaus, picnics, or as a refreshing treat on warm days. It showcases the sweet and tangy flavors characteristic of Hawaiian cuisine.

dishes.name: Hot dog
dishes.description: A popular American street food, the hot dog is a cooked sausage, typically beef or pork, served in a sliced bun. It is often topped with condiments like mustard, ketchup, relish, and onions. The sausage is usually steamed or grilled, and the dish is enjoyed as a quick snack or casual meal, especially at sporting events and outdoor gatherings.

dishes.name: Fruit Salad
dishes.description: A refreshing and healthy dessert or snack, fruit salad is a vibrant mix of fresh fruits like apples, oranges, bananas, and berries, often tossed with a light dressing of lemon juice and honey. This dish is enjoyed worldwide, with variations reflecting local produce and preferences. It's typically served chilled, making it a perfect treat for warm days or as a light accompaniment to meals.

dishes.name: Cheese sandwich
dishes.description: A cheese sandwich is a classic snack or light meal featuring slices of cheese between two pieces of bread. The bread is typically buttered and toasted to a golden crisp, enhancing the gooey, savory flavor of the melted cheese. This versatile dish is enjoyed worldwide, often as a quick breakfast or lunch option, and can be customized with additional ingredients like vegetables or meats.

dishes.name: Coffee
dishes.description: Coffee is a popular beverage made from roasted coffee beans, typically brewed with hot water. Originating from the Arab world, it is now enjoyed globally in various forms, such as espresso, latte, or cold brew. Its flavor profile ranges from bitter and robust to sweet and creamy, depending on the brewing method and added ingredients. Often consumed as a morning ritual or an afternoon pick-me-up, coffee is a staple in daily routines and social gatherings.

dishes.name: Sandwich
dishes.description: A sandwich is a versatile main course or snack made by layering various fillings between slices of bread. Core ingredients often include meats like ham or chicken, cheeses, vegetables such as lettuce and tomatoes, and condiments like mayonnaise or mustard. The bread can be toasted, grilled, or left plain, and the sandwich can be enjoyed cold or heated. Originating from Europe, sandwiches are popular worldwide, offering a savory and customizable meal option suitable for quick lunches, picnics, or light dinners.

dishes.name: Orange Juice
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Orange Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of oranges, typically enjoyed chilled. The core ingredient is fresh oranges, often blended or squeezed to create a tangy, sweet, and slightly acidic drink. It is commonly consumed as a breakfast beverage or a refreshing drink throughout the day, appreciated for its natural sweetness and vitamin C content.

dishes.name: Milk Shake
dishes.description: A classic beverage, a milkshake is a creamy, frothy drink made primarily from milk, ice cream, and flavorings such as fruit, chocolate, or vanilla. It is typically blended until smooth and served chilled in a tall glass, often topped with whipped cream and a cherry. Originating in the United States, milkshakes are enjoyed worldwide as a sweet treat or a refreshing accompaniment to meals.

dishes.name: Lemon Tea
dishes.description: Lemon Tea is a refreshing beverage made with black tea infused with fresh lemon juice, sugar, and sometimes spices like ginger or cardamom. Originating from various cultures, it is enjoyed hot or iced, often as a morning pick-me-up or an afternoon refreshment. The tangy and slightly sweet flavor makes it a popular choice for those seeking a citrusy twist on traditional tea.

dishes.name: PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Paneer Dosa is a savory Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, stuffed with spiced paneer (Indian cottage cheese). It is typically crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, served with coconut chutney and sambar. Originating from South India, this dish is a popular vegetarian main course or snack, enjoyed for its tangy and savory flavors. It is often found in restaurants and street food stalls, offering a delightful blend of textures and tastes.

dishes.name: BUTTER ONION MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A crispy, golden-brown dosa generously spread with caramelized onions and a rich, spiced potato filling, topped with melted butter. This South Indian specialty is a hearty and flavorful twist on the classic masala dosa, offering a delightful balance of sweet and savory notes. Perfect as a main course or a satisfying street food snack, it's typically served with coconut chutney and sambar.

dishes.name: ONION UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Onion Uttappam is a savory and hearty South Indian breakfast dish. It is a thick, spongy pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, generously topped with finely chopped onions and sometimes other vegetables. Cooked on a griddle until golden brown, it offers a delightful blend of tangy, spicy, and savory flavors. Typically served with coconut chutney or sambar, it is a popular choice for a filling morning meal.

dishes.name: PAPER SPL. DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Paper Spl. Dosa is a crispy, thin South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter. It is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, making it a popular breakfast or snack item. The dosa is known for its delicate, paper-thin texture and savory flavor, often enjoyed as a street food or daily meal.

dishes.name: PAPER PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Paper Paneer Dosa is a crispy, thin South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, stuffed with spiced paneer (Indian cottage cheese) and layered with onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. This savory snack is typically pan-fried to a golden brown and served with chutneys or sambar. Originating from the streets of South India, it offers a delightful crunch with a tangy and spicy flavor profile, making it a popular choice for a quick, satisfying meal.

dishes.name: BUTTER CHOWMIN FULL
dishes.description: Butter Chowmin Full is a rich, flavorful noodle dish that serves as a satisfying main course. It features stir-fried noodles coated in a creamy butter sauce, combined with a medley of vegetables and sometimes meat or seafood. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, this dish is known for its savory and slightly spicy flavor profile. It is typically enjoyed as a hearty meal, often accompanied by a side of salad or soup.

dishes.name: SINGLE IDLY
dishes.description: Single Idly is a steamed, soft, and fluffy rice cake from South India. Made primarily from fermented black gram and rice batter, it is a staple breakfast or snack item. Idly is typically served with chutney, sambar, or other accompaniments, offering a mild, slightly tangy flavor profile. It is a popular choice for a light and healthy meal.

dishes.name: BUTTER RAWA PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Rawa Paneer Dosa is a delicious South Indian dish that combines the crispiness of a dosa with the richness of paneer. Made from semolina (rava), grated paneer, butter, and spices, it is spread thinly on a hot griddle and cooked to a golden brown. This savory and slightly spicy dish is a popular breakfast or snack, often enjoyed with chutney or sambar. Its buttery flavor and crispy texture make it a delightful treat.

dishes.name: ONION TOMATO UTTAPAM
dishes.description: Onion Tomato Uttapam is a savory and hearty South Indian breakfast dish. Made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils, it is topped with finely chopped onions, tomatoes, and green chilies, then pan-fried to a golden crisp. This flavorful and slightly spicy uttapam is often enjoyed with coconut chutney or sambar, making it a popular choice for a wholesome morning meal.

dishes.name: RAWA ONION PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Rawa Onion Paneer Dosa is a savory and crispy South Indian crepe made primarily with semolina (rava), onions, and paneer. The batter is spiced with green chilies, ginger, and curry leaves, then spread thinly on a hot griddle and cooked to a golden brown. This versatile dish is enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, often accompanied by coconut chutney or sambar. Its crispy exterior and soft, flavorful interior make it a delightful treat.

dishes.name: ONION SPL. DOSA
dishes.description: Onion Spl. Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, generously topped with finely chopped onions, spices, and sometimes green chilies. It is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, making it a popular street food and breakfast item. The dish is known for its thin, golden-brown exterior and the burst of flavors from the caramelized onions and spices.

dishes.name: VEG. CHOWMIN FULL
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Veg. Chowmin Full is a hearty vegetarian noodle dish, a staple in Indian-Chinese cuisine. It features stir-fried noodles loaded with an assortment of vegetables like cabbage, carrots, and bell peppers, tossed in a savory soy-based sauce. The dish is typically enjoyed as a main course, offering a delightful blend of umami and spicy flavors, perfect for a quick and satisfying meal.

dishes.name: VEG. CHOWMIN HALF
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Veg. Chowmin Half is a popular vegetarian stir-fried noodle dish, originating from the Indian subcontinent. It features a medley of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, cabbage, and carrots, tossed with boiled noodles and a savory blend of spices. The dish is lightly seasoned with soy sauce, chili, and garlic, offering a balance of tangy and umami flavors. Typically served as a quick, flavorful main course or a hearty snack, it's a staple in Indian-Chinese cuisine.

dishes.name: MASALA VADA SAMBAR
dishes.description: Masala Vada Sambar is a popular South Indian snack or light meal. It consists of crispy, spiced lentil fritters (masala vada) served in a flavorful, tangy lentil-based stew (sambar). The vada are typically made from soaked and ground lentils mixed with spices, then deep-fried until golden. This dish is enjoyed for breakfast or as a street food, offering a delightful combination of textures and a harmonious blend of spicy, savory, and tangy flavors.

dishes.name: BUTTER PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Paneer Dosa is a rich and indulgent variation of the classic South Indian crepe. Made with fermented rice and lentil batter, it is stuffed with a generous layer of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) and butter, then crisped to perfection. This dish is a popular main course or snack, often enjoyed with chutneys and sambar. Originating from South India, it offers a delightful blend of savory and creamy flavors, making it a favorite among vegetarians.

dishes.name: PAPER BUTTER PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Paper Butter Plain Dosa is a thin, crispy South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter. It is typically spread thinly on a hot griddle to achieve a delicate, paper-like texture. Served with a generous drizzle of ghee and accompanied by coconut chutney or sambar, this dosa is a popular breakfast or snack item, known for its savory and slightly tangy flavor.

dishes.name: VADA SAMBAR
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Vada Sambar is a popular South Indian dish that combines crispy lentil fritters (vada) with a flavorful, tangy lentil stew (sambar). The vada is typically made from soaked and ground lentils mixed with spices, then deep-fried to a golden brown. Served as a hearty breakfast or lunch, this dish offers a delightful contrast of textures and a savory, spicy, and tangy flavor profile. It is a staple in South Indian cuisine and is often enjoyed with steamed rice or idli.

dishes.name: SPL MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: SPL Masala Dosa is a popular South Indian main course dish. It features a crispy, fermented rice and lentil crepe (dosa) filled with a spiced potato and onion mixture (masala), often tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. The dosa is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, a lentil-based vegetable stew. This dish is a staple in South Indian cuisine, enjoyed for its savory, spicy, and tangy flavors, and is commonly found in restaurants and street food stalls.

dishes.name: RAWA PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Rawa Plain Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava), rice flour, and sometimes soaked rice. It is typically spread thinly on a hot griddle and cooked until golden and crispy. This dosa is enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, often paired with chutney or sambar for a tangy and savory contrast.

dishes.name: BUTTER RAWA MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Rawa Masala Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava) and rice batter, cooked to a golden hue and generously brushed with melted butter. This dosa is stuffed with a spiced potato and onion masala, offering a delightful blend of flavors. Originating from the coastal regions of India, it is a popular breakfast or snack item, often enjoyed with coconut chutney or sambar. The dish boasts a crispy exterior, soft interior, and a rich, buttery aroma.

dishes.name: PANEER UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Paneer Uttappam is a savory and nutritious Indian dish that combines the goodness of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) with the traditional South Indian uttappam. This dish is made by blending soaked rice, urad dal (black gram), and sometimes semolina, which is then fermented and mixed with grated paneer, onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. The batter is spread into a thick, fluffy pancake and cooked on a griddle until golden brown. It is enjoyed as a hearty breakfast or a wholesome snack, often paired with coconut chutney or sambar.

dishes.name: BUTTER CHOWMIN HALF
dishes.description: Butter Chowmin Half is a popular Indo-Chinese street food dish. It features half a portion of chowmein noodles stir-fried with a medley of vegetables like cabbage, carrots, and bell peppers, tossed in a savory butter sauce. The dish is seasoned with soy sauce, vinegar, and green chilies, offering a balance of tangy, spicy, and savory flavors. Typically served as a quick snack or light meal, it's enjoyed hot and fresh, often accompanied by a side of fried rice or spring rolls.

dishes.name: PANEER CHOWMIN FULL
dishes.description: Paneer Chowmin Full is a hearty and flavorful Indian stir-fried noodle dish featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) as the star ingredient. The dish combines noodles, an assortment of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, carrots, and cabbage, and is seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices such as turmeric, cumin, and coriander. The ingredients are stir-fried together, creating a savory and slightly spicy dish that is both satisfying and nutritious. Paneer Chowmin Full is a popular choice for a quick and delicious meal, often enjoyed as a main course in Indian households and restaurants.

dishes.name: MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Experience the delightful blend of spices and flavors in our traditional Masala Dosa. A crispy, golden crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, filled with a medley of mashed potatoes, onions, and zesty spices, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

dishes.name: BUTTER MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Masala Dosa is a popular South Indian dish that elevates the classic dosa with a rich, spiced masala filling. Made from fermented rice and lentil batter, the crispy dosa encases a creamy potato filling cooked with butter, onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices. This indulgent variation is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, making it a hearty main course or a satisfying breakfast option. Originating from the southern regions of India, it offers a delightful balance of savory and buttery flavors.

dishes.name: PAPER MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: A crispy, wafer-thin variation of the classic South Indian dosa, Paper Masala Dosa is made with a fermented rice and lentil batter, spread paper-thin and cooked until golden and crisp. It is typically stuffed with a spiced potato filling and served with coconut chutney and sambar. This dish is a popular street food and breakfast item, known for its delicate crunch and savory flavors.

dishes.name: ONION PANEER UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Onion Paneer Uttappam is a savory and hearty South Indian dish, a variation of the traditional uttappam. It features a thick, spongy pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, generously topped with caramelized onions and soft paneer cubes. Cooked on a griddle until golden and crisp, it offers a delightful blend of textures and flavors. This dish is typically enjoyed for breakfast or as a snack, often accompanied by coconut chutney or sambar.

dishes.name: BUTTER RAWA PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Butter Rawa Plain Dosa is a South Indian breakfast or snack dish made from semolina (rava), rice flour, and sometimes all-purpose flour, creating a crispy, golden-brown crepe. It is typically cooked on a griddle and spread with melted butter for added richness. This dosa is enjoyed plain, often accompanied by sambar (lentil stew) and coconut chutney, offering a savory and slightly buttery flavor profile. It is a popular choice for a quick, satisfying meal or street food.

dishes.name: MIX UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Mix Uttappam is a savory and hearty South Indian breakfast dish. It is made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils, mixed with a variety of vegetables like onions, tomatoes, and bell peppers, then pan-fried to a golden brown. This dish is known for its crispy edges and soft center, offering a delightful mix of textures and flavors. It is typically enjoyed with coconut chutney or sambar, making it a perfect start to the day.

dishes.name: RAWA ONION MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Rawa Onion Masala Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava) and rice flour, layered with a spiced onion filling. This dish is typically shallow-fried to a golden brown and served with chutneys and sambar. Originating from the coastal regions of India, it offers a delightful crunch and a burst of flavors from the caramelized onions and aromatic spices. Perfect as a breakfast or snack, it's a popular choice for a quick, satisfying meal.

dishes.name: BUTTER SPL. DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Spl. Dosa is a popular South Indian breakfast or snack dish. This crispy and fluffy crepe is made from fermented rice and lentil batter, cooked on a griddle and generously spread with melted butter. Originating from the southern regions of India, it is typically served with chutneys and sambar, offering a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile. Enjoyed as a daily meal or a quick snack, it's a staple in South Indian cuisine.

dishes.name: BUTTER ONION SPL. DOSA
dishes.description: A crispy and flavorful South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, enriched with butter and topped with caramelized onions. This specialty dosa is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, making it a popular breakfast or snack option. The combination of buttery richness and sweet onions creates a delightful balance of flavors, enjoyed best as a hearty street food or a comforting daily meal.

dishes.name: ONION MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Onion Masala Dosa is a popular South Indian snack or breakfast dish. It features a crispy, fermented rice and lentil crepe filled with a spiced mixture of onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. The dosa is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, offering a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile. This dish is a staple in South Indian cuisine and is enjoyed both as a street food and a daily meal.

dishes.name: RAWA MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Rawa Masala Dosa is a popular South Indian breakfast or snack dish. Made from semolina (rava) and rice flour, it is fermented and spread into a thin, crispy crepe, then stuffed with a spiced potato filling. The dosa is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, offering a delightful combination of crispy and soft textures with a savory, mildly spicy flavor profile.

dishes.name: PANEER CHOWMIN HALF
dishes.description: Paneer Chowmin Half is a popular vegetarian stir-fried noodle dish, featuring paneer (Indian cottage cheese) as the star ingredient. The dish is prepared by stir-frying noodles with a medley of vegetables, paneer, and a blend of aromatic spices, creating a savory and mildly spicy flavor profile. Originating from the Indian subcontinent, this dish is commonly enjoyed as a main course or a hearty snack, often served in street food stalls and restaurants.

dishes.name: VADA (DRY 2 PES.)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Vada (Dry 2 Pes.) is a popular South Indian snack made primarily from lentils, rice, and spices. These deep-fried, savory fritters are crispy on the outside and soft inside, often enjoyed with chutneys or sambar. Originating from Tamil Nadu, this dish is a staple in street food culture and is commonly served as a breakfast or evening snack.

dishes.name: IDLY (DRY 2 PES)
dishes.description: Idly (Dry 2 Pes) is a popular South Indian snack made from steamed rice and lentil cakes, typically served dry with a variety of chutneys and sambar. The core ingredients include fermented rice and urad dal batter, which is steamed into soft, fluffy cakes. This version is specifically served dry, accompanied by coconut chutney, tomato chutney, and a tangy sambar. It is a staple in South Indian cuisine, enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, offering a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile.

dishes.name: BUTTER PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Butter Plain Dosa is a popular South Indian breakfast or snack made from fermented rice and lentil batter, spread thinly into a crispy crepe and cooked on a griddle. It is generously topped with melted butter, giving it a rich, savory flavor. This dish is typically served with sambar (lentil stew) and coconut chutney, making it a delightful combination of textures and tastes. It is a staple in South Indian households and is enjoyed for its light yet satisfying nature.

dishes.name: TOMATO UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Tomato Uttappam is a savory and tangy South Indian dish, a variation of the traditional uttappam. It is made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils, topped with tomatoes and sometimes onions and green chilies, then pan-fried to a crispy edge with a soft, spongy center. Originating from the coastal regions of India, it is typically enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, often accompanied by coconut chutney or sambar. The dish offers a delightful blend of flavors, with the tanginess of tomatoes complementing the savory and slightly spicy notes of the batter.

dishes.name: BUTTER ONION PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Butter Onion Paneer Dosa is a delectable South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, layered with caramelized onions, melted butter, and paneer. It is crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, offering a savory and slightly sweet flavor profile. This dish is typically enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, often accompanied by chutney or sambar.

dishes.name: RAWA PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Rawa Paneer Dosa is a popular South Indian snack or breakfast dish. It is made from semolina (rava) and grated paneer, creating a soft and slightly crispy crepe. The batter is spiced with green chilies, ginger, and curry leaves, then cooked on a hot griddle until golden. This savory and mildly spicy dosa is often served with coconut chutney or sambar, making it a delightful street food or daily meal option.

dishes.name: ONION PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Onion Plain Dosa is a popular South Indian snack or breakfast dish. It is made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils, spread thinly on a hot griddle, and cooked until crispy. Topped with finely chopped onions, this dosa offers a mild, savory flavor with a hint of sweetness from the caramelized onions. It is typically served with coconut chutney or sambar, making it a delightful and satisfying meal option.

dishes.name: SINGLE VADA
dishes.description: Single Vada is a popular South Indian snack made primarily from lentils, rice, and spices. The batter is deep-fried to a golden crisp, resulting in a savory and slightly spicy flavor profile. Often enjoyed as a breakfast item or street food, it is typically served with coconut chutney or sambar. This dish is a staple in South Indian cuisine, known for its satisfying crunch and hearty taste.

dishes.name: ONLY SAMBAR
dishes.description: Sambar is a hearty and tangy lentil-based vegetable stew, originating from South India. Core ingredients include pigeon peas, tamarind, and a blend of spices such as turmeric, cumin, and mustard seeds, often accompanied by vegetables like drumsticks, carrots, and pumpkin. It is typically prepared by cooking the lentils and vegetables in a spiced tamarind broth, with a tempering of mustard seeds and curry leaves added for depth. Sambar is a staple in South Indian cuisine, enjoyed as a daily meal, often paired with rice, idli, or dosa, and celebrated for its savory, slightly tangy, and spicy flavor profile.

dishes.name: PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Plain Dosa is a thin, crispy South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter. It is typically served with chutney and sambar, offering a mild, slightly tangy flavor. This versatile dish is enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, often accompanied by various side dishes. Its golden-brown exterior and soft interior make it a beloved staple in South Indian cuisine.

dishes.name: ONION PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Onion Paneer Dosa is a savory South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, generously topped with caramelized onions and soft paneer cubes. This crispy yet soft dosa is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, making it a popular breakfast or snack item. Its flavor profile is a delightful blend of tangy, savory, and slightly sweet notes, with the paneer adding a creamy texture.

dishes.name: BUTTER RAWA SPL. DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Rawa Spl. Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava) and rice batter, enriched with butter for a rich flavor. It is typically prepared by spreading the batter thinly on a hot griddle and cooking until golden brown. This dish is a popular street food and breakfast item, often enjoyed with chutneys and sambar. Its flavor profile is mildly tangy and nutty, with a satisfying crunch.

dishes.name: PAPER PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Paper Plain Dosa is a crispy, thin South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter. It is typically served plain without any toppings, allowing the natural flavors of the batter to shine. This versatile dish is enjoyed as a breakfast item or a light meal, often accompanied by sambar, chutney, or podi. Its delicate texture and mild taste make it a popular choice for those who prefer a simpler, less spicy option.

dishes.name: PAPER BUTTER MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: A crispy, thin South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, Paper Butter Masala Dosa is a popular breakfast or snack. It features a delicate, paper-thin dosa layered with a rich, spiced potato and onion masala, and drizzled with melted ghee and butter. The dish is known for its savory, slightly tangy flavor and is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, making it a hearty and satisfying meal.

dishes.name: ONION TOMATO UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Onion Tomato Uttappam is a savory and tangy South Indian breakfast dish made from fermented rice and lentil batter, topped with finely chopped onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. This thick, pancake-like dish is cooked on a griddle until crispy on the edges and soft in the center. It is a popular street food and a staple in South Indian households, often enjoyed with coconut chutney or sambar.

dishes.name: RAWA SPL. MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Rawa Spl. Masala Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava) and rice batter, stuffed with a spiced potato and onion filling. It is typically pan-fried to a golden brown and served with coconut chutney and sambar. This dish is a popular street food and breakfast item, known for its crunchy texture and flavorful filling.

dishes.name: RAWA ONION PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Rawa Onion Plain Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made primarily from semolina (rava), onions, and rice flour. It is lightly spiced with green chilies and curry leaves, then pan-fried to a golden brown. Often enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, it is typically served with coconut chutney or sambar, making it a popular choice for a quick, satisfying meal.

dishes.name: IDLY SAMBAR
dishes.description: Idly Sambar is a popular South Indian dish combining steamed idly (fermented rice cakes) with sambar, a lentil-based vegetable stew. The idly is soft and fluffy, while the sambar is a tangy, spicy, and savory blend of lentils, vegetables, and tamarind. This dish is typically enjoyed as a breakfast or light meal, offering a balance of flavors and textures. It is a staple in South Indian cuisine and is often served with coconut chutney or podi (spice powder) for added flavor.

dishes.name: EGG BURGER
dishes.description: An egg burger is a savory snack or light meal featuring a fried or scrambled egg as the main protein, typically nestled within a soft bun. Core ingredients include eggs, bread or buns, and various condiments like mayonnaise, mustard, or ketchup, often accompanied by vegetables such as lettuce, tomatoes, and onions. Originating as a quick and affordable option, it is enjoyed globally, particularly as a street food or fast-food item. The flavor profile is rich and savory, with a satisfying texture from the crispy egg and soft bun.

dishes.name: VEGGIE BURGER
dishes.description: A Veggie Burger is a plant-based patty served in a bun, often accompanied by fresh vegetables, sauces, and condiments. The patty is typically made from ingredients like beans, lentils, mushrooms, or vegetables, seasoned and bound together, then grilled or pan-fried. Originating as a vegetarian alternative to the classic hamburger, it is enjoyed as a main course in various cuisines, offering a savory and sometimes slightly smoky flavor profile. Perfect for a quick meal or a hearty lunch, it can be found in casual dining settings and fast-food chains alike.

dishes.name: MARGARITA
dishes.description: Margarita is a classic cocktail known for its refreshing and tangy flavor. The core ingredients include tequila, lime juice, and triple sec or orange liqueur, often garnished with a salted rim. This beverage is typically served chilled and is enjoyed as an aperitif or a festive drink. Originating from Mexico, the Margarita is a popular choice in both casual and upscale settings.

dishes.name: APPLE PIE
dishes.description: Apple pie is a classic dessert featuring a flaky pastry crust filled with spiced apples, often cinnamon and sugar. The apples are typically stewed or baked until tender, creating a sweet and tangy filling. Originating from Europe, it is now enjoyed worldwide, often served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream.

dishes.name: SOFT DRINK CAN
dishes.description: A soft drink can is a sealed, portable container typically made of aluminum or steel, holding a carbonated beverage. The can is filled with a variety of sweetened, flavored liquids such as cola, lemon-lime, orange, or root beer. It is enjoyed chilled and is a popular choice for refreshment, often consumed as a beverage accompaniment to meals or as a standalone drink for hydration and pleasure. The can is designed for convenience, allowing easy opening and drinking on the go.

dishes.name: TUNA & ONION
dishes.description: Tuna & Onion is a simple yet flavorful dish typically served as a main course or a hearty snack. The core ingredients include fresh tuna, onions, and a blend of spices, often pan-fried or grilled to perfection. Originating from various coastal regions, this dish is known for its savory and slightly tangy flavor profile. It is commonly enjoyed as a quick meal or a protein-rich snack, often accompanied by rice or bread.

dishes.name: 4 CHEESES
dishes.description: 4 Cheeses is a rich and indulgent dish that showcases a blend of four distinct cheeses. Typically made with a combination of mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gorgonzola, it is often baked or melted to create a gooey, flavorful experience. This dish is popular in Italian cuisine and is enjoyed as a main course or a luxurious appetizer. Its creamy texture and complex flavor profile make it a favorite among cheese lovers.

dishes.name: CHEESE BURGER
dishes.description: A classic American fast-food staple, the Cheese Burger features a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, served between a soft bun. Typically grilled or fried, it's often accompanied by lettuce, tomato, onion, and condiments like ketchup and mustard. Enjoyed as a quick meal or snack, it's a popular choice for its savory, indulgent flavor profile.

dishes.name: BIG BEN BURGER
dishes.description: The Big Ben Burger is a hearty main course featuring a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, and a fried egg. It is typically served on a toasted brioche bun, accompanied by fresh lettuce, ripe tomato slices, and a tangy BBQ sauce. This indulgent burger is a popular choice for a satisfying meal, often enjoyed at casual dining establishments or fast-food chains.

dishes.name: PEPPERONI
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a popular type of salami, typically made from cured pork and beef mixed with paprika or other chili pepper. It is often sliced thinly and used as a topping for pizzas, where it adds a spicy, smoky flavor. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is enjoyed as a savory, slightly spicy snack or main course ingredient, commonly found in delis and pizzerias.

dishes.name: HAWAIIAN
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Hawaiian typically refers to a pizza topped with ham, pineapple, and often cheese. The dish combines sweet and savory flavors, with the pineapple adding a tropical twist. Originating from the United States, it is enjoyed as a main course, often in casual dining settings or as a popular takeout option.

dishes.name: BOTTLED WATER
dishes.description: Bottled water is a beverage consisting of water that has been packaged in plastic or glass bottles. It is typically sourced from springs, wells, or municipal supplies and is often treated to ensure purity and safety. This refreshing drink is enjoyed worldwide as a daily staple, providing hydration in various settings, from casual meals to outdoor activities.

dishes.name: ICE CREAM CORNET
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A classic Ice Cream Cornet is a delightful frozen dessert consisting of creamy ice cream served in a crisp, cone-shaped pastry. The core ingredients include milk, sugar, cream, and sometimes egg yolks for the ice cream, while the cornet is typically made from flour, butter, and sugar. This sweet treat is enjoyed worldwide as a popular dessert or snack, often savored on hot days or as a delightful conclusion to a meal. Its flavor profile is sweet and creamy, with the texture contrast of the crunchy cornet and smooth ice cream.

dishes.name: DONUT
dishes.description: A donut is a sweet, fried dough confectionery, typically ring-shaped, although other shapes exist. Made primarily from flour, sugar, and yeast or baking powder, it is deep-fried and often glazed or topped with sugar, chocolate, or sprinkles. Originating in Europe, donuts are now enjoyed worldwide as a popular dessert or snack, often paired with coffee or tea.

dishes.name: SPICY BEAN BURGER
dishes.description: A hearty and flavorful vegetarian patty made primarily from mashed beans, spices, and breadcrumbs, often mixed with onions, garlic, and herbs. The patties are typically pan-fried or baked until crispy and served on a bun with fresh vegetables, tangy sauces, and sometimes melted cheese. Originating from various global cuisines, this dish is enjoyed as a main course or a satisfying snack, offering a savory and spicy flavor profile that appeals to both vegetarians and meat-eaters alike.

dishes.name: DOUBLE CHEESE
dishes.description: Double Cheese is a rich and indulgent dish, typically a burger or sandwich, featuring two layers of melted cheese. The core ingredients include a soft bun or bread, a juicy patty or filling, and generous amounts of cheese, often cheddar or American. It is prepared by grilling or toasting the bun, melting the cheese over the filling, and assembling the layers. Originating from American fast-food culture, it offers a savory and creamy flavor profile, perfect for a quick meal or snack. It is commonly enjoyed as a main course or a hearty snack.

dishes.name: TEA or COFFEE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Tea is a beloved beverage made from steeping the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant in hot water. It comes in various forms, including black, green, white, and oolong, each offering unique flavor profiles. Originating in China, tea is enjoyed worldwide, often as a daily ritual or social custom, and can be savored plain or enhanced with milk, sugar, or spices.

dishes.name: WAFFLE & ICE CREAM
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A classic dessert featuring crisp, golden waffles topped with creamy, cold ice cream. The waffles are typically made from a batter of flour, eggs, and milk, baked in a special iron to create a grid pattern. The combination of warm waffles and cool ice cream creates a delightful contrast in temperature and texture. Often served with various toppings like chocolate sauce, fresh fruits, or whipped cream, this treat is enjoyed worldwide as a sweet indulgence.

dishes.name: ORANGE JUICE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Orange Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of oranges, often enjoyed for its sweet and tangy flavor. The core ingredient is fresh oranges, which are typically squeezed or blended to release their juice. This popular drink is commonly served chilled as a breakfast staple or throughout the day for hydration and vitamin C intake. It can be enjoyed plain or with added sweeteners and spices like mint or ginger.

dishes.name: CALZONE
dishes.description: A calzone is an Italian turnover pastry made from pizza dough, stuffed with ingredients such as cheese, meats, and vegetables, and then baked. It is similar to a folded pizza and is often seasoned with herbs like oregano and basil. This dish is typically enjoyed as a main course or a hearty snack, with a savory and cheesy flavor profile. Calzones are popular in Italian cuisine and are often served with a side of marinara sauce for dipping.

dishes.description: Bloody Mary Mix is a savory beverage base, typically used to create the classic Bloody Mary cocktail. Core ingredients include tomato juice, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, lemon juice, and various spices like black pepper and celery salt. This mix is often combined with vodka to make the popular drink, known for its tangy, spicy, and slightly savory flavor profile. It is commonly enjoyed as a brunch accompaniment or a morning pick-me-up, particularly in Western cultures.

dishes.name: MIMOSA'S FOR TWO
dishes.description: Mimosa's for Two is a delightful brunch or breakfast dish featuring two servings of classic mimosa cocktails. The core ingredients include freshly squeezed orange juice and chilled sparkling wine, which are gently mixed to create a refreshing and effervescent drink. This elegant beverage is typically enjoyed as a celebratory or festive drink, perfect for special occasions or a leisurely weekend brunch. The flavor profile is sweet, tangy, and slightly bubbly, offering a harmonious balance of citrus and wine.
