dishes.name: PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Plain Dosa is a thin, crispy South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter. It is typically served hot and plain, often accompanied by coconut chutney and sambar. This popular breakfast or snack item is enjoyed for its light, savory flavor and delicate texture, making it a staple in South Indian cuisine.

dishes.name: BUTTER ONION SPL. DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Onion Spl. Dosa is a South Indian specialty, a crispy and flavorful variation of the classic dosa. Made from fermented rice and lentil batter, it is generously topped with caramelized onions and melted butter, creating a rich and savory profile. This dosa is typically served as a breakfast or snack, accompanied by sambar and coconut chutney, offering a delightful blend of textures and flavors.

dishes.name: VADA (DRY 2 PES.)
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Vada (Dry 2 Pes.) is a popular South Indian snack, typically enjoyed as a breakfast or tea-time accompaniment. These deep-fried lentil fritters are made from a batter of ground lentils, spices, and herbs, resulting in a crispy exterior and a soft, savory interior. Originating from the Tamil Nadu region, this dish is known for its spicy and slightly tangy flavor profile, often served with coconut chutney or sambar for added depth.

dishes.name: ONION TOMATO UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Onion Tomato Uttappam is a savory and hearty South Indian breakfast dish. Made from fermented rice and lentil batter, it is topped with finely chopped onions, tomatoes, and green chilies, then pan-fried to a golden crisp. This flavorful dish is a staple in South Indian cuisine, offering a delightful mix of tangy, spicy, and savory notes. It is typically enjoyed with coconut chutney or sambar for a complete meal.

dishes.name: ONION SPL. DOSA
dishes.description: Onion Spl. Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, generously topped with finely chopped onions, and sometimes other vegetables or spices. It is typically cooked on a griddle until golden brown and served with coconut chutney and sambar, making it a popular breakfast or snack item. The dish is known for its thin, crunchy texture and the sweet, tangy flavor of the caramelized onions.

dishes.name: BUTTER SPL. DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Spl. Dosa is a popular South Indian breakfast or snack dish. This crispy, golden-brown crepe is made from fermented rice and lentil batter, cooked on a griddle and generously spread with melted butter. Originating from the southern regions of India, it offers a delightful blend of savory and buttery flavors. Typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, it's a favorite for its crispy texture and rich taste.

dishes.name: TOMATO UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Tomato Uttappam is a savory and tangy South Indian breakfast dish. Made from fermented rice and lentil batter, it features a thick, spongy base topped with juicy tomatoes, onions, and mild spices. This nutritious and flavorful dish is typically enjoyed hot with coconut chutney or sambar, making it a popular choice for a hearty morning meal.

dishes.name: PANNEER CHOWMIN HALF
dishes.description: PANNEER CHOWMIN HALF is a popular Indo-Chinese vegetarian dish featuring tender paneer (cottage cheese) stir-fried with an assortment of vegetables like bell peppers, cabbage, and carrots. The dish is seasoned with soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and a blend of Chinese spices, creating a savory and slightly spicy flavor profile. Typically served as a main course, it is enjoyed hot with steamed rice or noodles, making it a favorite in both restaurants and home kitchens.

dishes.name: IDLY SAMBAR
dishes.description: Idly Sambar is a popular South Indian dish that combines steamed rice cakes (idly) with a flavorful lentil and vegetable stew (sambar). The idly is soft and fluffy, while the sambar is a tangy, spicy, and savory blend of lentils, tamarind, tomatoes, and a variety of spices. This dish is typically enjoyed as a main course for breakfast or lunch, often accompanied by coconut chutney or sambar powder for added flavor. It is a staple in South Indian cuisine and is widely appreciated for its balanced and comforting flavors.

dishes.name: MASALA VADA SAMBAR
dishes.description: Masala Vada Sambar is a popular South Indian snack or light meal. It features crispy, spiced lentil fritters (masala vada) served in a flavorful, tangy lentil stew (sambar). The vada are typically made from soaked and ground lentils mixed with spices, then deep-fried until golden. The dish is enjoyed for its contrasting textures and bold, savory flavors, often paired with steamed rice or idli.

dishes.name: BUTTER RAWA PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: A crispy and savory South Indian crepe made with semolina (rava) and paneer, cooked to golden perfection. This dosa is enriched with butter, giving it a rich and indulgent flavor. It is typically served with coconut chutney or sambar, making it a popular breakfast or snack option.

dishes.name: ONION PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Onion Plain Dosa is a popular South Indian snack or light meal, featuring a crispy, golden-brown crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter. It is typically topped with finely chopped onions and sometimes mild spices, then cooked to perfection on a griddle. This savory and slightly tangy dish is often served with coconut chutney or sambar, making it a delightful choice for breakfast or a quick bite.

dishes.name: BUTTER PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Butter Paneer Dosa is a popular South Indian dish that combines the crispiness of a dosa with the richness of paneer and butter. Made from fermented rice and lentil batter, it is stuffed with spiced paneer and cooked to a golden brown, then generously topped with melted butter. This savory and slightly tangy dish is a delightful fusion of flavors, often enjoyed as a main course or a hearty breakfast, typically accompanied by chutney and sambar.

dishes.name: PANEER UTTAPPAM
dishes.description: Paneer Uttappam is a savory and hearty South Indian dish, a variation of the traditional uttappam made with grated vegetables and paneer. This thick, spiced pancake is prepared by fermenting a batter of rice and lentils, then cooking it with paneer and vegetables like onions, tomatoes, and bell peppers. Originating from the southern regions of India, it is known for its tangy and slightly spicy flavor profile. Served as a main course or breakfast item, it is often accompanied by coconut chutney or sambar.

dishes.name: RAWA ONION MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Rawa Onion Masala Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava) and rice flour, stuffed with a spiced onion filling. The dosa is thinly spread and cooked on a hot griddle until golden and crispy, then served with coconut chutney and sambar. This dish is a popular breakfast or snack item, enjoyed for its delightful crunch and flavorful filling.

dishes.name: ONION MASALA DOSA

The dosa is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, offering a savory and slightly spicy flavor profile. It is made from a fermented batter of rice and black gram, mixed with an assortment of finely chopped vegetables like onions, tomatoes, capsicum, and sometimes corn. This thick, spongy pancake is cooked on a griddle until golden brown, offering a delightful blend of textures and flavors. Enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, it is often paired with coconut chutney or sambar for a satisfying meal.

dishes.description: Onion Uttappam is a savory and hearty South Indian dish, originating from the Tamil Nadu region. It is a type of thick, spiced pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, generously topped with finely chopped onions, and sometimes other vegetables like tomatoes or green chilies. The uttappam is pan-fried to a golden crisp, offering a delightful contrast of textures and a tangy, slightly spicy flavor profile. It is typically enjoyed as a breakfast or snack, often accompanied by coconut chutney or sambar.

dishes.name: RAWA ONION PANEER DOSA
dishes.description: Rawa Onion Paneer Dosa is a crispy, savory Indian crepe made from semolina (rava), onions, and paneer. The batter is spread thinly on a hot griddle and cooked until golden, resulting in a delightful crunch. This dish is a popular breakfast or snack, often enjoyed with chutney or sambar. Its flavor profile is mildly spicy and aromatic, making it a comforting and satisfying choice.

dishes.name: BUTTER CHOWMIN FULL
dishes.description: Butter Chowmin Full is a rich and flavorful noodle dish, a popular Indo-Chinese staple. It features stir-fried noodles tossed with a medley of vegetables like cabbage, carrots, and bell peppers, enhanced with a savory soy-based sauce and a generous drizzle of melted butter. The dish is known for its savory and slightly tangy flavor profile, often enjoyed as a main course or a hearty snack. Typically served hot and garnished with green onions, it's a favorite in Indian-Chinese cuisine.

dishes.name: MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Savor the authentic flavors of India with our Masala Dosa, a delightful culinary experience. This crispy, fermented rice and lentil crepe is filled with a medley of spiced potatoes, offering a perfect balance of textures and tastes.

dishes.name: RAWA MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Rawa Masala Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava) and rice flour, stuffed with a spiced potato and onion filling. It is typically pan-fried to a golden brown and served with coconut chutney and sambar. This dish is a popular breakfast or snack item, known for its crunchy texture and flavorful filling.

dishes.name: VADA SAMBAR
dishes.description: Vada Sambar is a popular South Indian dish that combines crispy vadas (lentil or gram flour fritters) with a tangy and spicy sambar (lentil-based vegetable stew). The vadas are deep-fried to a golden brown, while the sambar is simmered with a blend of spices, tamarind, and vegetables. This hearty and flavorful dish is often enjoyed as a breakfast or a comforting meal, typically served hot with steamed rice or idli. It's a staple in South Indian cuisine, known for its savory and slightly spicy taste.

dishes.name: BUTTER ONION MASALA DOSA
dishes.description: Butter Onion Masala Dosa is a South Indian main course dish featuring a crispy, fermented rice and lentil crepe (dosa) layered with a spiced onion and butter filling. The dosa is typically served with coconut chutney and sambar, offering a savory and slightly tangy flavor profile. This indulgent variation of the classic masala dosa is enjoyed as a hearty breakfast or a satisfying meal.

dishes.name: ONION TOMATO UTTAPAM
dishes.description: Onion Tomato Uttapam is a savory and hearty South Indian dish, typically enjoyed as a breakfast or snack. This thick, spiced pancake is made from a fermented batter of rice and lentils, loaded with finely chopped onions, tomatoes, and green chilies. The batter is spread on a hot griddle and cooked until golden brown, creating a crispy exterior with a soft, fluffy interior. It is often served with coconut chutney and sambar, offering a tangy and spicy flavor profile.

dishes.name: RAWA ONION PLAIN DOSA
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Rawa Onion Plain Dosa is a crispy, savory South Indian crepe made from semolina (rava) and finely chopped onions. It is a popular breakfast or snack item, often served with chutney or sambar. The dosa is thin and golden, with a slightly nutty flavor from the roasted semolina and a mild onion sweetness. It is enjoyed as a quick, satisfying meal or street food.

dishes.name: SINGLE VADA
dishes.description: Single Vada is a popular South Indian snack, typically enjoyed as a breakfast or tea-time treat. Made from a batter of ground lentils, rice, and spices, it is deep-fried to a golden crisp. The vada boasts a savory and slightly spicy flavor profile, often accompanied by chutneys or sambar. It is a staple in street food culture and is commonly savored across the region.

dishes.name: EGG BURGER
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. An Egg Burger is a popular snack or light meal featuring a fried or scrambled egg nestled within a soft bun, often accompanied by lettuce, tomato, and condiments like mayonnaise or mustard. Originating from various cultures, it is enjoyed for its savory and satisfying flavors, making it a quick and easy option for a casual meal or on-the-go snack.

dishes.name: MARGARITA
dishes.description: Margarita is a classic cocktail known for its refreshing and tangy flavor. It is made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, typically garnished with a salted rim and a lime wedge. Originating from Mexico, this beverage is a popular choice for social gatherings and celebrations. It is enjoyed as an aperitif or a festive drink, often served chilled in a margarita glass.

dishes.name: VEGGIE BURGER
dishes.description: A Veggie Burger is a plant-based twist on the classic burger, featuring a patty made from ingredients like beans, lentils, mushrooms, or tofu, often combined with vegetables and spices. The patty is typically grilled or fried and served in a bun, accompanied by fresh lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and condiments like ketchup, mustard, or mayo. Originating as a vegetarian and vegan alternative, it is enjoyed as a main course in various cuisines worldwide, offering a savory and hearty flavor profile. Perfect for a quick meal or a casual dining experience, it's a popular choice for those seeking a meat-free option.

dishes.name: CALZONE
dishes.description: A Calzone is an Italian turnover made from dough similar to that of pizza, folded to encase a variety of fillings. Core ingredients typically include mozzarella cheese, tomato sauce, and various meats or vegetables, all baked to golden perfection. Originating from Naples, this savory pocket is enjoyed as a main course or hearty snack, offering a rich, cheesy, and slightly tangy flavor profile. It's often served with a side of marinara sauce for dipping.

dishes.name: HAWAIIAN
dishes.description: Hawaiian cuisine is a vibrant fusion of Polynesian, Asian, and American influences, featuring fresh, tropical ingredients. Core components often include pineapple, coconut, taro, and a variety of seafood like mahi-mahi and ahi tuna. Dishes are typically prepared through grilling, steaming, or baking, with a focus on bold, sweet, and savory flavors. Served as a main course or side, Hawaiian food is enjoyed in both casual and festive settings, reflecting the islands' rich cultural heritage.

dishes.name: TEA or COFFEE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Tea is a beloved beverage made from steeping the leaves of the Camellia sinensis plant in hot water. Originating in China, it is now enjoyed worldwide in various forms, including black, green, white, and oolong. Its flavor profile ranges from earthy and robust to floral and delicate, often enhanced with milk, sugar, or herbs. Served hot or iced, tea is a staple in daily routines and social gatherings alike.

dishes.name: SOFT DRINK CAN
dishes.description: A soft drink can is a sealed, portable container typically made of aluminum or steel, filled with a carbonated beverage. Common flavors include cola, lemon-lime, orange, and root beer, often sweetened and flavored with various syrups and essences. These beverages are enjoyed chilled, either as a standalone drink or paired with meals, offering a refreshing and fizzy experience. Widely available globally, soft drink cans are a staple in convenience stores, vending machines, and households, providing a quick and convenient way to enjoy a variety of flavored sodas.

dishes.name: BIG BEN BURGER
dishes.description: The Big Ben Burger is a hearty main course featuring a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, and a fried egg. Served on a toasted brioche bun with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy BBQ sauce, it's a flavorful and indulgent meal. Originating from the United Kingdom, this burger is a popular choice for a satisfying lunch or dinner, often enjoyed at pubs and casual dining spots.

dishes.name: ICE CREAM CORNET
dishes.description: A delightful frozen dessert, Ice Cream Cornet features creamy ice cream scoops served in a crisp, cone-shaped pastry. The core ingredients include milk, sugar, and flavorings for the ice cream, along with flour, butter, and eggs for the cornets. This treat is enjoyed globally as a sweet indulgence, often savored as a dessert or snack. The flavor profile ranges from classic vanilla and chocolate to more exotic options, offering a cool, sweet, and creamy experience.

dishes.name: DOUBLE CHEESE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Double Cheese is a rich and indulgent dish, typically a burger or sandwich, featuring a generous layering of two types of cheese. The main components include a soft bun or bread, a juicy patty or filling, and a double layer of melted cheese, often cheddar and mozzarella. The dish is usually grilled or toasted to perfection, enhancing the flavors and textures. It is a popular choice for a hearty meal or a satisfying snack, enjoyed for its creamy, savory, and comforting taste.

dishes.name: SPICY BEAN BURGER
dishes.description: A plant-based delight, the Spicy Bean Burger is a flavorful vegetarian patty made primarily from mashed beans, breadcrumbs, and an array of spices. These patties are typically pan-fried or baked until crispy, offering a satisfying crunch with every bite. Originating as a popular vegan and vegetarian alternative, this dish is enjoyed for its savory and spicy notes, often served in a bun with fresh vegetables and condiments. Perfect for a quick lunch or a hearty dinner, it's a versatile main course that's both nutritious and delicious.

dishes.name: PEPPERONI
dishes.description: Pepperoni is a type of salami, characterized by its spicy, smoky flavor and vibrant red color. Made primarily from cured pork and beef, it is seasoned with paprika or other chili pepper for its signature heat. This popular pizza topping is typically thinly sliced and enjoyed for its savory, slightly spicy taste. Originating from the United States, pepperoni is a staple in American cuisine, often used in sandwiches, charcuterie boards, and as a topping for various dishes.

dishes.name: WAFFLE & ICE CREAM
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. A classic dessert featuring crispy, golden waffles topped with creamy, cold ice cream. The waffles are typically made from a batter of flour, eggs, milk, and baking powder, then cooked on a waffle iron to achieve their distinctive grid pattern. The ice cream, often vanilla, chocolate, or a variety of flavors, melts slightly over the warm waffles, creating a delightful contrast in temperature and texture. This sweet treat is commonly enjoyed as a dessert or snack, often accompanied by toppings like syrup, fruit, or whipped cream.

dishes.name: BOTTLED WATER
dishes.description: Bottled water is a beverage consisting of water that has been packaged in plastic or glass bottles. It is typically sourced from natural springs, artesian wells, or municipal water supplies and undergoes filtration and purification processes. This refreshing drink is enjoyed worldwide as a daily staple, often served chilled and paired with meals or consumed on its own for hydration.

dishes.name: ORANGE JUICE
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Orange Juice is a refreshing beverage made from the extraction of liquid from fresh oranges. Typically prepared by squeezing or blending oranges and then straining the pulp, it is enjoyed chilled and can be sweetened or unsweetened. This popular drink is consumed worldwide as a breakfast staple or a thirst-quenching beverage throughout the day.

dishes.name: CHEESE BURGER
dishes.description: A classic American fast-food favorite, the Cheese Burger is a savory main course featuring a juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and onions, all sandwiched between a soft bun. The patty is typically grilled or fried to perfection, and the burger is often enhanced with condiments like ketchup, mustard, and mayonnaise. Enjoyed as a quick meal or snack, it's a staple in diners and fast-food chains worldwide, offering a delightful combination of rich, savory, and tangy flavors.

dishes.name: TUNA & ONION
dishes.description: Tuna & Onion is a simple yet flavorful dish featuring fresh tuna steaks or fillets cooked with caramelized onions. The tuna is typically pan-seared or grilled to perfection, while the onions are saut√©ed until golden and sweet. This dish is popular in various cuisines, particularly in Mediterranean and Japanese cooking, where it is enjoyed as a main course or a hearty meal. The combination of tender tuna and sweet onions creates a savory and slightly sweet flavor profile, often enhanced with a touch of garlic, herbs, or a squeeze of lemon.

dishes.name: 4 CHEESES
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. 4 Cheeses is a rich and indulgent dish, often enjoyed as a main course or a decadent appetizer. It features a blend of four distinct cheeses, typically including cheddar, mozzarella, parmesan, and blue cheese, layered or melted together. This dish is commonly prepared by baking or grilling, creating a gooey, savory delight with a complex flavor profile. It is popular in various cuisines, often served as a comforting meal or a luxurious treat.

dishes.name: APPLE PIE
dishes.description: A classic American dessert, apple pie features a flaky, buttery crust filled with spiced apples, typically cinnamon, sugar, and sometimes nutmeg. The apples are often pre-cooked to soften them before being encased in the pie dough and baked until golden. Served warm, it's a beloved treat, often accompanied by a scoop of vanilla ice cream or a dollop of whipped cream, making it a perfect ending to any meal.

dishes.name: DONUT
dishes.description: A beloved sweet treat, the donut is a fried or baked dough confection, often ring-shaped, with a soft, fluffy interior and a slightly crisp exterior. Core ingredients include flour, sugar, eggs, and yeast or baking powder, with variations featuring glazes, fillings, or toppings like chocolate, sprinkles, or powdered sugar. Originating in ancient times, donuts are enjoyed worldwide as a popular dessert, snack, or breakfast item, with a rich, sweet flavor profile that can range from simple sugar-coated to decadent filled varieties.

dishes.name: Mediterranean Salad
dishes.description: A refreshing and vibrant salad featuring crisp cucumbers, ripe tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese, all tossed in a tangy olive oil and lemon dressing. This dish is a staple of Mediterranean cuisine, known for its fresh and savory flavors. It is typically served as a side dish or a light main course, perfect for warm weather or as a healthy accompaniment to grilled meats.

dishes.name: Chicken Alfredo
dishes.description: Chicken Alfredo is a creamy, indulgent pasta dish featuring tender chicken pieces and fettuccine noodles coated in a rich Alfredo sauce. The sauce, made with butter, heavy cream, and Parmesan cheese, complements the savory chicken and al dente pasta. Originating from Italian-American cuisine, this dish is a beloved comfort food often enjoyed as a main course in casual dining settings.

dishes.name: Crispy Calamari
dishes.description: Savor the delightful combination of lightly breaded and crispy-fried calamari, served to perfection. A delectable appetizer for any seafood enthusiast.

dishes.name: Lemonade
dishes.description: Lemonade is a refreshing beverage made from fresh lemons, water, and sugar. It is typically prepared by squeezing lemons to extract their juice, which is then mixed with water and sweetened to taste. This tangy and sweet drink is enjoyed worldwide, often as a cooling refreshment on hot days or as a popular accompaniment to meals. It can be served plain or flavored with various additives like mint, berries, or herbs.

dishes.name: Buffalo Chicken Dip
dishes.description: Buffalo Chicken Dip is a creamy, spicy appetizer featuring shredded chicken tossed in buffalo sauce, mixed with cream cheese, ranch or blue cheese dressing, and melted cheddar cheese. This indulgent dip is typically baked until bubbly and served warm with tortilla chips, celery sticks, or crusty bread. Originating in the United States, it's a popular game-day snack or party food, offering a tangy, spicy, and rich flavor profile that's irresistibly savory.

dishes.name: Cobb Salad
dishes.description: Cobb Salad is a hearty main course salad that originated in the United States. It features a base of mixed greens topped with grilled chicken, hard-boiled eggs, avocado, tomatoes, bacon, blue cheese, and chives, all drizzled with a creamy dressing. This dish is enjoyed for its rich, savory flavors and is often served as a substantial lunch or dinner option. It's a popular choice for its combination of fresh and indulgent ingredients.

dishes.name: Iced Tea
dishes.description: Iced tea is a refreshing beverage made by brewing tea leaves and then cooling the resulting liquid over ice. It typically includes black tea, sugar, and lemon, though variations may incorporate other fruits, herbs, or sweeteners. Originating in the United States, it is enjoyed year-round as a popular drink, often served in tall glasses with ice cubes and garnished with lemon slices or mint leaves. The flavor profile is generally sweet and tangy, with a crisp, invigorating finish.

dishes.name: Caprese Salad
dishes.description: Caprese Salad is a classic Italian appetizer featuring fresh mozzarella cheese, ripe tomatoes, and fragrant basil leaves. The ingredients are typically layered or arranged on a plate, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil, and seasoned with salt and pepper. This vibrant dish showcases the freshness of its components, offering a delightful balance of creamy, tangy, and herbaceous flavors. It is often enjoyed as a starter or a light meal, embodying the simplicity and elegance of Mediterranean cuisine.

dishes.name: Caesar Salad
dishes.description: Caesar Salad is a classic American dish featuring crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and a creamy dressing made with garlic, anchovies, lemon juice, olive oil, and Worcestershire sauce. The salad is typically tossed together and served as a starter or light main course, often accompanied by grilled chicken or shrimp. Its rich, tangy, and savory flavors make it a popular choice in both casual and fine dining settings.

dishes.name: Grilled Salmon
dishes.description: Grilled Salmon is a main course dish featuring succulent salmon fillets cooked over an open flame or grill. The primary ingredients include fresh salmon, olive oil, salt, pepper, and often a blend of herbs such as dill or lemon. This method of preparation enhances the natural flavors of the salmon, resulting in a savory and slightly smoky taste. It is commonly enjoyed as part of a healthy meal, often accompanied by vegetables or a side of rice.

dishes.name: Soft Drinks
dishes.description: Soft drinks are non-alcoholic, carbonated beverages known for their sweet and fizzy nature. Typically made with water, carbon dioxide, and a variety of flavorings such as fruit extracts, sugar, or artificial sweeteners. These refreshing drinks are enjoyed worldwide as a popular accompaniment to meals or a standalone thirst quencher, often served chilled in glasses with ice.

dishes.name: Baked Eggplant Parmesan
dishes.description: Here is the description for the given dish. Baked Eggplant Parmesan is a hearty main course featuring layers of tender eggplant, rich tomato sauce, melted mozzarella, and Parmesan cheese. The eggplant is typically breaded and baked until golden, then assembled with the other ingredients and baked again for a crispy, cheesy delight. Originating from Italian-American cuisine, this dish offers a savory and comforting flavor profile, perfect for a satisfying family meal or a cozy dinner.
